name: Caring Senior Service of Round Rock
address: 1 Chisholm Trail, Suite 450, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Caring Senior Service of Round Rock has been a trusted name in non-medical home care throughout Williamson County for over a decade. Their team of trained caregivers provides personalized assistance with daily living activities, companionship, meal preparation, light housekeeping, and transportation to appointments across the Round Rock and Georgetown areas. What sets them apart is their GreatCare method, a proprietary approach that pairs each client with a caregiver whose skills and personality match the individual's needs and preferences. Families throughout WilCo appreciate their transparent communication style, with regular check-ins and detailed care logs accessible through a convenient online portal. Whether you need a few hours of help each week or around-the-clock support, their flexible scheduling accommodates a wide range of situations. Their caregivers are thoroughly background-checked, insured, and receive ongoing training in fall prevention, nutrition for seniors, and dementia-aware communication techniques. Many local families near Old Settlers Park and the Round Rock Premium Outlets have relied on Caring Senior Service to help their loved ones maintain independence at home. They also offer specialized transition care for those returning home after a hospital stay or surgery at nearby St. David's Round Rock Medical Center. Free in-home assessments are available, giving families a chance to discuss needs and create a customized care plan without any obligation.
shortDescription: Trusted non-medical home care with personalized caregiver matching in Round Rock.

deal.title: 15% Off First Month
deal.detail: Valid through March 2026

name: BrightStar Care of Cedar Park & Leander
address: 715 Discovery Blvd, Suite 207, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: BrightStar Care of Cedar Park and Leander delivers a full spectrum of in-home care services, from companion care to skilled nursing, throughout western Williamson County. As a Joint Commission-accredited agency, they maintain the same rigorous quality standards found in top hospitals, giving families peace of mind that their loved ones receive exceptional care at home. Their registered nurses develop individualized care plans and oversee all services, whether that means helping with medication management, wound care, physical therapy support, or simply providing friendly companionship during the day. Located conveniently near the 1890 Ranch Shopping Center in Cedar Park, their office serves families across Cedar Park, Leander, Liberty Hill, and the surrounding Hill Country communities. Many residents in the Crystal Falls and Block House Creek neighborhoods have come to rely on their dependable team for both short-term recovery care and long-term daily assistance. BrightStar Care stands out for their A Higher Standard promise, which includes a Director of Nursing who personally supervises every client's care plan and conducts regular home visits. They accept most long-term care insurance policies and can help families navigate Veterans Administration benefits. Their caregivers complete specialized training in Alzheimer's and dementia care, fall prevention, and chronic condition management. For families juggling busy schedules, their 24/7 availability and live phone answering ensure help is always just a call away, day or night.
shortDescription: Joint Commission-accredited home health and skilled nursing care in Cedar Park and Leander.

name: Home Instead - Georgetown
description: Home Instead of Georgetown has been providing compassionate, personalized home care to seniors throughout northern Williamson County since 2005. Their experienced team of Care Professionals assists with a broad range of daily needs including personal care, meal preparation, medication reminders, transportation to local appointments, and meaningful companionship. Situated along the Williams Drive corridor near Georgetown's thriving commercial district, they serve families in Georgetown, Sun City Texas, Jarrell, Florence, and the surrounding rural communities. Home Instead is nationally recognized for their CARE training program, which equips every caregiver with practical skills in Alzheimer's and dementia support, chronic disease management, and hospice comfort care. This training is especially valued by families in the Sun City Texas community, where many active adults eventually need a helping hand to continue living comfortably in the homes they love. Their team takes a relationship-first approach, carefully matching each client with a Care Professional based on personality, interests, and care requirements. Many clients enjoy outings to the Georgetown Square, visits to local parks along the San Gabriel River, and drives through the beautiful Hill Country scenery with their caregivers. Home Instead also offers their City Bus transportation assistance program, helping seniors stay connected with Georgetown's vibrant community life. Free care consultations are available at your home or at their Williams Drive office, with no long-term contracts required.
shortDescription: Personalized non-medical home care serving Georgetown and northern Williamson County.

deal.title: Free First 2-Hour Visit
deal.detail: For new clients, valid through April 2026

name: Comfort Keepers of Round Rock
address: 2000 S IH-35, Suite H-1, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Comfort Keepers of Round Rock brings their nationally recognized Interactive Caregiving philosophy to families across central Williamson County. Rather than simply doing things for clients, their caregivers actively engage seniors in daily activities, encouraging participation at whatever level is comfortable and safe. This approach has been shown to improve physical and mental well-being, helping active adults maintain their independence longer. Their services include personal care, meal preparation, light housekeeping, medication reminders, grocery shopping at nearby H-E-B and Costco locations, and transportation to medical appointments at local clinics and hospitals. Comfort Keepers also offers their proprietary SafetyChoice technology suite, which includes medical alert systems, medication management devices, and personal emergency response systems that can be installed in homes throughout Round Rock, Pflugerville, and Hutto. Families particularly appreciate their GrandPad tablet program, a simplified tablet device that helps seniors stay connected with family through video calls, photo sharing, and easy-to-use apps. Their office near the IH-35 and University Boulevard intersection serves as a hub for caregiver coordination across the region. All caregivers are thoroughly screened, bonded, and insured, and receive ongoing training in safe transfer techniques, fall prevention, and nutrition for older adults. Whether you need a few hours of companionship each week or comprehensive 24-hour care, Comfort Keepers builds a care plan around your family's specific situation. Call for a free in-home consultation and personalized care assessment.
shortDescription: Interactive home care services with technology solutions for Round Rock area seniors.

name: Visiting Angels of Williamson County
description: Visiting Angels of Williamson County has earned a reputation as one of the most trusted home care providers in the region, serving families from Georgetown to Pflugerville and everywhere in between. Their Select Your Caregiver program is a standout feature, allowing clients and their families to interview and choose the caregiver they feel most comfortable with before services begin. This level of choice and control is rare in the home care industry and reflects Visiting Angels' deep commitment to client dignity and satisfaction. Services range from companion care and errands to personal hygiene assistance, meal preparation, and overnight monitoring. They specialize in supporting adults aging in place, helping residents of communities like Sun City Texas, Teravista, and Behrens Ranch continue living safely and comfortably at home. Their caregivers are trained in Safe and Steady fall prevention techniques and receive certification in dementia-supportive care through the Visiting Angels national training program. The Georgetown office coordinates care across all of Williamson County, with dedicated scheduling staff who work to maintain consistency by sending the same caregivers to each client whenever possible. Families consistently praise the warmth, reliability, and professionalism of their care team. Visiting Angels also partners with local hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and physicians' offices to provide seamless transition care when a loved one returns home after a medical event. Contact them for a free, no-obligation home care assessment tailored to your family's unique needs.
shortDescription: Choose your own caregiver with Visiting Angels' personalized home care across WilCo.

event.title: Caregiver Hiring Event
event.detail: Open interviews at Georgetown office. Bring resume and references.

name: Heart & Hearth Home Care
description: Heart & Hearth Home Care is a locally owned and operated home health agency serving the Pflugerville, Hutto, and eastern Williamson County communities. Founded by a Pflugerville family who experienced firsthand the challenges of finding quality in-home care for an aging parent, Heart & Hearth was built on the principle that every person deserves attentive, dignified care in the comfort of their own home. Their licensed team provides skilled nursing visits, physical therapy, occupational therapy, and medical social work services, all coordinated through your primary care physician. They also offer non-medical companion care for those who simply need a helping hand with daily tasks or a friendly face during the week. Their office near the Stone Hill Town Center makes them accessible to families throughout the fast-growing Pflugerville corridor. Heart & Hearth caregivers are familiar with the neighborhoods and communities they serve, from the established subdivisions near Pfluger Park to the newer developments along SH-130. They accept Medicare, Medicaid, and most major insurance plans, and their billing team helps families understand coverage options and minimize out-of-pocket costs. The agency is Medicare-certified and maintains excellent quality ratings on the CMS Home Health Compare website. Their care coordinators are available by phone during extended hours to address questions or concerns. For families exploring home health options in eastern WilCo, Heart & Hearth offers free initial consultations and can often begin services within 48 hours of physician referral.
shortDescription: Locally owned home health agency serving Pflugerville, Hutto, and eastern WilCo.

name: Trusted Hands Senior Care
address: 409 W Front St, Suite B, Hutto, TX 78634
description: Trusted Hands Senior Care is a boutique home care agency based in the heart of historic downtown Hutto, providing affordable non-medical care to seniors and adults with disabilities throughout eastern Williamson County. As one of the few home care agencies headquartered in Hutto, they have deep roots in the local community and understand the unique needs of residents in this rapidly growing area. Their services include companion care, personal care assistance, meal preparation, light housekeeping, errand running, and transportation to appointments in Hutto, Taylor, Round Rock, and Pflugerville. Trusted Hands takes pride in keeping their services affordable without sacrificing quality, making professional home care accessible to families across a range of budgets. Their caregivers live in the communities they serve, which means shorter response times and a genuine understanding of local resources. The agency works closely with physicians and care managers at Baylor Scott & White and Ascension Seton facilities to ensure coordinated care for clients transitioning from hospital to home. They offer flexible scheduling from a few hours per week to full-time daily care, with no minimum hour requirements. Owner Maria Gonzalez, a longtime Hutto resident, personally oversees caregiver hiring and training, ensuring every team member meets her high standards for compassion, reliability, and professionalism. Trusted Hands also partners with local churches and community organizations to provide information sessions on aging in place and available support resources. Contact them for a free phone or in-home consultation.
shortDescription: Affordable boutique home care in Hutto and eastern Williamson County.

deal.title: First Week 20% Off
deal.detail: New clients only, valid through March 2026

name: Silverado Georgetown Memory Care
description: Silverado Georgetown Memory Care is a purpose-built community dedicated exclusively to individuals living with Alzheimer's disease, dementia, and other forms of memory impairment. Nestled in a quiet residential area near Georgetown's scenic Berry Creek neighborhood, the community offers a warm, home-like environment where residents receive round-the-clock specialized care from trained memory care professionals. Silverado's nationally recognized program emphasizes engagement and purpose, with daily activities tailored to each resident's abilities, interests, and life history. Residents enjoy music therapy, art programs, gardening in the community's raised-bed gardens, pet therapy with resident dogs and cats, and guided outdoor walks along the community's secure pathways. The clinical team includes licensed nurses on-site 24/7, with access to geriatric psychiatrists, neurologists, and other specialists through partnerships with local healthcare providers. Silverado Georgetown features private and semi-private suites designed with safety features like motion-sensor lighting, secure entries, and visual cues that help residents navigate their environment with confidence. Families are always welcome and encouraged to participate in care planning, attend support groups, and join community events. The community is conveniently located near Rivery Park and the San Gabriel River corridor, allowing families to enjoy beautiful surroundings during visits. Silverado accepts long-term care insurance, Veterans Administration benefits, and private pay. Schedule a personal tour to experience their compassionate approach to memory care firsthand.
shortDescription: Purpose-built memory care community with 24/7 specialized dementia support in Georgetown.

event.title: Family Support Group
event.detail: Monthly support group for families of those with dementia. Free and open to the public.

name: Autumn Leaves of Cedar Park
description: Autumn Leaves of Cedar Park provides specialized memory care in a secure, nurturing environment designed specifically for individuals with Alzheimer's and dementia. Their community features the innovative Meaningful Moments program, which uses personalized activity plans based on each resident's life story, career background, hobbies, and cultural traditions. Located along the Discovery Boulevard corridor near the Brushy Creek trail system, the community offers families in Cedar Park, Leander, and western Williamson County a comforting option for their loved ones. The building itself is thoughtfully designed with wide hallways, natural lighting, secure outdoor courtyards with walking paths, and distinct neighborhoods that feel like home rather than a clinical facility. Each neighborhood has its own living room, dining area, and activity space, creating an intimate atmosphere where staff know every resident by name. Clinical care is overseen by a licensed nurse and a team of certified dementia care practitioners who use evidence-based approaches to manage behavioral symptoms without over-reliance on medication. The culinary program features home-style meals prepared fresh daily, with adaptive dining options that support independence at the table. Autumn Leaves also offers respite care stays for families who need temporary support while they travel or simply take a break. Their family engagement program includes monthly educational seminars on dementia topics, regular family nights, and access to the community's Family Resource Library. Tours are available seven days a week, and their team is happy to answer questions about care options, costs, and the transition process.
shortDescription: Specialized Alzheimer's and dementia care with the Meaningful Moments program in Cedar Park.

deal.title: Complimentary Respite Stay
deal.detail: 3-day trial stay for new families, subject to availability

name: WilCo Memory Care at Berry Springs
description: WilCo Memory Care at Berry Springs is a locally owned and operated memory care community that brings a distinctly Williamson County character to specialized dementia support. Located on a peaceful wooded property near Berry Springs Park, the community offers a tranquil setting where residents benefit from nature views, fresh air, and the calming sounds of the surrounding landscape. With capacity for just 36 residents, WilCo Memory Care provides an unusually intimate level of attention, with a caregiver-to-resident ratio that exceeds state requirements. Their Texas Roots program incorporates local culture into daily activities, including country music sing-alongs, Texas history discussions, gardening with native plants, and baking sessions featuring classic Southern recipes. The community is designed as a series of connected ranch-style homes, each housing a small group of residents who share meals, activities, and daily life together. This household model reduces the institutional feel and promotes genuine connections between residents and staff. Clinical oversight includes a full-time licensed vocational nurse and regular visits from a geriatric nurse practitioner who specializes in dementia care. The community works with families to develop individualized care plans that honor each resident's preferences, routines, and personal history. WilCo Memory Care accepts private pay and long-term care insurance, and their admissions coordinator provides transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Families are invited to visit anytime and to participate in the community's regular social events and holiday celebrations.
shortDescription: Intimate, locally owned memory care community near Berry Springs Park in Georgetown.

name: Riverview Memory Suites
description: Riverview Memory Suites offers a modern, thoughtfully designed memory care experience in the heart of Round Rock. Their state-of-the-art community, which opened in 2023, incorporates the latest research in dementia-friendly design, including color-coded neighborhoods, sensory gardens, a dedicated salon and spa, and interactive technology stations that stimulate cognitive engagement. Each suite features large windows with views of landscaped grounds, accessible bathrooms with walk-in showers, and personal space for familiar furniture and treasured belongings from home. The care team at Riverview includes certified dementia practitioners, licensed nurses, and a full-time activities director who creates engaging daily programming. Signature programs include their Music & Memory initiative, which uses personalized playlists to evoke positive emotions and spark recognition, and their Culinary Connections program, where residents participate in simplified cooking activities that tap into long-held kitchen skills. Located near the Brushy Creek corridor in northeast Round Rock, the community is convenient for families living in the Teravista, Paloma Lake, and Forest Creek neighborhoods. Riverview partners with round Rock-area neurologists and geriatricians to ensure residents receive coordinated medical care. They also offer a robust family education series covering topics like understanding dementia progression, managing caregiver stress, and legal and financial planning for families. Their admissions team guides families through the decision-making process with compassion, providing transparent information about care levels, costs, and what to expect during the transition. Tours are available daily.
shortDescription: Modern, research-based memory care community in northeast Round Rock.

name: Pflugerville Memory Care Center
description: Pflugerville Memory Care Center fills an important need in the eastern Williamson County corridor, offering dedicated memory care services in a warm, homelike setting. Their community is designed around small household neighborhoods of just 12 residents each, ensuring personalized attention and strong relationships between caregivers and the individuals they serve. The care philosophy centers on meeting each person where they are, focusing on remaining abilities rather than limitations, and creating moments of joy and connection throughout each day. Activities include gentle exercise classes, reminiscence therapy, creative arts, sensory stimulation programs, and regular visits from local therapy animal volunteers. The community's secure outdoor space features a walking garden with textured pathways, raised flower beds, and comfortable seating areas where residents and visiting families can enjoy the Texas sunshine together. Located near the intersection of SH-130 and SH-45, Pflugerville Memory Care Center is easily accessible from Pflugerville, Hutto, Manor, and northeastern Round Rock. Their clinical team includes licensed nurses who provide 24-hour oversight, manage medications, and coordinate with each resident's physician to ensure consistent medical care. The community accepts private pay, long-term care insurance, and some Medicaid waiver programs. Their social worker assists families with navigating benefits, accessing community resources, and coping with the emotional challenges of a loved one's diagnosis. Pflugerville Memory Care Center welcomes visitors for tours and encourages families to spend time getting to know the community before making a decision.
shortDescription: Small-household memory care in Pflugerville serving eastern Williamson County.

name: Sun City Texas
description: Sun City Texas is the premier 55+ active adult community in Williamson County and one of the largest age-restricted communities in the entire state. Spanning over 5,600 acres in northwest Georgetown, this Del Webb community is home to more than 9,500 households and offers an unmatched array of amenities designed to keep residents active, engaged, and connected. The community features three recreation centers, three 18-hole championship golf courses, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a state-of-the-art fitness center, miles of walking and biking trails, tennis and pickleball courts, a craft village with studios for woodworking, ceramics, stained glass, and quilting, and a performing arts theater that hosts concerts, plays, and community events throughout the year. Over 60 chartered clubs and organizations cater to every interest imaginable, from photography and gardening to book clubs, dance groups, and volunteer organizations. Sun City Texas residents enjoy a vibrant social calendar with hundreds of events each month, including live music nights, wine tastings, holiday celebrations, and educational lectures. The community is conveniently located near Georgetown's charming downtown square, with easy access to restaurants, shopping, healthcare facilities, and the natural beauty of the San Gabriel River and Lake Georgetown. Home styles range from low-maintenance garden homes to spacious single-family residences, many with Hill Country views. The Sun City Community Association manages common areas and amenities, with monthly association dues covering landscaping, facility maintenance, and access to all recreational facilities. Whether you're looking for an active social life, world-class recreational amenities, or simply a beautiful place to call home, Sun City Texas delivers.
shortDescription: Williamson County's premier 55+ active adult community with world-class amenities in Georgetown.

event.title: Spring Open House & Home Tour
event.detail: Tour model homes, explore amenities, and meet current residents. Free and open to prospective homebuyers.

name: Wellbridge of Pflugerville
description: Wellbridge of Pflugerville combines short-term rehabilitation with long-term skilled nursing care in a modern, hotel-inspired setting that challenges traditional expectations of senior care facilities. Their post-acute rehabilitation program is designed to get individuals back home as quickly and safely as possible following surgery, stroke, cardiac events, or other medical situations. The therapy team includes physical therapists, occupational therapists, and speech-language pathologists who use advanced equipment including a therapy gym, an Activities of Daily Living suite that simulates a home environment, and outdoor walking paths with varied terrain. For residents requiring long-term care, Wellbridge offers private and semi-private suites with personal climate control, flat-screen televisions, Wi-Fi, and room service dining options alongside a traditional dining room experience. The community's location along Pflugerville Parkway provides easy access from IH-35 and SH-130, making it convenient for families across the eastern half of Williamson County. Medical care is directed by board-certified physicians and supported by 24-hour licensed nursing staff. Wellbridge participates in Medicare, Medicaid, and most major insurance programs, and their admissions team works with hospital discharge planners to facilitate smooth transitions from acute care. Unique amenities include a bistro with complimentary coffee and snacks, a salon and barber shop, a chapel with regular services, and an activities program that keeps residents engaged with outings to local restaurants, live entertainment, and themed social events. Contact their admissions office for a tour or to discuss care needs for your family member.
shortDescription: Modern rehabilitation and skilled nursing facility on Pflugerville Parkway.

name: The Delaney at Georgetown Village
description: The Delaney at Georgetown Village offers a resort-style senior living experience with independent living, assisted living, and memory care all on one beautifully landscaped campus. This Life Plan Community allows residents to age in place, transitioning between levels of care as their needs change without the upheaval of moving to a new facility. The community's architecture and interior design reflect the charm of the Texas Hill Country, with limestone accents, wide covered porches, and spacious common areas that invite relaxation and socialization. Independent living residents enjoy elegant apartment homes with full kitchens, in-unit laundry, and access to a resort-style pool, fitness center, art studio, putting green, and multiple dining venues ranging from casual bistro to formal dining. Assisted living residents receive personalized support with daily activities while maintaining as much independence as possible, with trained caregivers available around the clock. The Delaney's location along University Avenue near the Wolf Ranch shopping district means residents have easy access to restaurants, medical offices, and entertainment. Their robust wellness program includes fitness classes, educational lectures, live cultural performances, book clubs, and regular outings to Austin attractions and Georgetown's historic downtown square. The Delaney partners with local healthcare providers to coordinate on-site physician visits, lab work, therapy services, and pharmacy delivery. Their dedicated life enrichment team creates a full monthly calendar that keeps residents active, socially connected, and intellectually stimulated. Schedule a lunch and tour to experience what makes The Delaney special.
shortDescription: Resort-style independent and assisted living with memory care in Georgetown Village.

deal.title: Second Month Free
deal.detail: On select floor plans for new move-ins through April 2026

name: Lonesome Creek Ranch Senior Living
description: Lonesome Creek Ranch Senior Living offers a uniquely Texan approach to assisted living, situated on a picturesque Hill Country property west of Georgetown. The community embraces the warmth and hospitality of ranch-style living while providing professional assisted living care in a comfortable, secure environment. Residents live in private or shared suites within a series of connected ranch homes, each featuring a welcoming front porch, spacious common living areas with stone fireplaces, and country-style dining rooms where meals are served family-style with locally sourced ingredients when possible. The property's natural landscape includes walking trails that wind through native wildflower meadows, a stocked fishing pond, and shaded patios where residents can enjoy the serene Hill Country views. Activities at Lonesome Creek Ranch reflect the community's rural character, with gardening programs, bird watching outings, live Texas music performances, and weekly barbecues during warm weather months. The care team provides assistance with daily activities including bathing, dressing, medication management, and mobility support, all delivered with the friendly, unhurried pace that defines Hill Country hospitality. Lonesome Creek Ranch is family owned and operated, which means decisions are made locally by people who know each resident personally. The community maintains a high staff-to-resident ratio to ensure everyone receives the individual attention they deserve. Located just a short drive from Georgetown's downtown square and medical facilities, Lonesome Creek Ranch combines the peace of country living with convenient access to urban amenities.
shortDescription: Ranch-style assisted living on a scenic Hill Country property near Georgetown.

name: Cedar Park Senior Village
address: 1500 Cottonwood Creek Trl, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Cedar Park Senior Village is a welcoming independent living community designed for active adults 55 and older who want to enjoy a maintenance-free lifestyle without sacrificing comfort or convenience. Located near the Brushy Creek corridor in Cedar Park, the community offers one and two-bedroom apartment homes with modern finishes, full kitchens, washer-dryer connections, and private patios or balconies. Residents enjoy access to a community clubhouse with a fitness center, media room, game room, and beautifully landscaped outdoor spaces including a swimming pool, barbecue pavilion, and community garden. The all-inclusive monthly rent covers water, sewer, trash, basic cable, Wi-Fi, and scheduled transportation to shopping, medical appointments, and community outings throughout western Williamson County and Austin. Cedar Park Senior Village hosts a full calendar of social events and activities, from morning yoga and water aerobics to evening happy hours, card game tournaments, and monthly birthday celebrations. The community's location puts residents just minutes from the 1890 Ranch shopping center, Cedar Park Regional Medical Center, and the beautiful trails along Brushy Creek Lake Park. A full-time activities coordinator works with residents to plan outings to local attractions, cultural events in Austin, and seasonal celebrations. The community is pet-friendly, welcoming cats and small dogs. There are no buy-in fees or long-term leases required, making Cedar Park Senior Village an affordable and flexible option for independent living in the area. Schedule a tour and stay for lunch to experience the community lifestyle.
shortDescription: Maintenance-free independent living for 55+ adults near Brushy Creek in Cedar Park.

deal.title: Move-In Special
deal.detail: First month free on 12-month lease, through March 2026

name: Heritage Oaks Retirement Community
address: 2200 Sam Bass Rd, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Heritage Oaks Retirement Community provides a warm, welcoming home for retirees in the heart of Round Rock. This mid-size community offers both independent living apartments and assisted living suites, allowing residents to transition smoothly between care levels as needs evolve. The campus is shaded by mature heritage oak trees that give the community its name and provide a beautiful, parklike setting that residents treasure. Independent living apartments feature spacious floor plans with full kitchens, walk-in closets, and private outdoor spaces. Assisted living suites include all the comforts of home with the added security of 24-hour trained staff, medication management, and personalized care plans. All residents enjoy chef-prepared meals served in a restaurant-style dining room, a well-stocked library, a computer lab with complimentary Wi-Fi, a beauty salon and barber shop, and a chapel with weekly interdenominational services. The community's location along Sam Bass Road provides quick access to Round Rock's shopping, dining, and medical facilities, including St. David's Round Rock Medical Center and Baylor Scott & White Round Rock. Heritage Oaks' activity program is managed by a full-time lifestyle director who organizes daily fitness classes, creative workshops, educational speakers, movie nights, and regular outings to local restaurants and Austin-area attractions. The community also maintains a robust volunteer program, connecting residents with opportunities to give back to the Round Rock community. No entrance fees are required, and month-to-month agreements are available.
shortDescription: Independent and assisted living under heritage oaks in central Round Rock.

name: Baylor Scott & White Primary Care - Round Rock
description: Baylor Scott & White Primary Care in Round Rock is a cornerstone of healthcare for families and seniors throughout central Williamson County. Their experienced team of board-certified family medicine and internal medicine physicians provides comprehensive primary care services with a strong emphasis on preventive health and chronic disease management. For adults 55 and older, they offer annual wellness visits, Medicare wellness exams, comprehensive health screenings, immunizations, and management of conditions like diabetes, hypertension, arthritis, and heart disease. The clinic is part of the Baylor Scott & White Health system, giving patients access to an extensive network of specialists, advanced diagnostic imaging, laboratory services, and hospital care at the nearby Baylor Scott & White Medical Center in Round Rock. Their electronic health records system allows seamless coordination between primary care providers and specialists, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks. The modern clinic on University Boulevard features comfortable waiting areas, accessible exam rooms, and an on-site lab for routine blood work and testing. Same-day and next-day appointments are often available, and patients can also access virtual visits through the MyBSWHealth app for minor concerns that do not require an in-person exam. The practice accepts Medicare, Medicare Advantage plans, and most commercial insurance policies. Their patient navigators assist with referrals, prior authorizations, and connecting patients with community resources throughout the Round Rock area.
shortDescription: Comprehensive primary care with strong senior wellness programs on University Blvd.

name: Ascension Seton Primary Care - Georgetown
description: Ascension Seton Primary Care on Williams Drive brings trusted internal medicine services to the Georgetown community, with a particular focus on adult and senior health. Their team of internists specializes in the complex medical needs that often accompany aging, including managing multiple chronic conditions, optimizing medication regimens, and coordinating care across specialists. The clinic is well-positioned to serve residents of Sun City Texas and the surrounding Georgetown neighborhoods, with many patients appreciating the personalized, unhurried approach their physicians take during office visits. As part of the Ascension Seton healthcare network, patients benefit from integrated electronic medical records, streamlined referrals to specialists at Ascension Seton Williamson, and access to the broader Ascension system's resources for complex care needs. Preventive care is a cornerstone of their practice, with comprehensive annual physicals, cancer screenings, bone density testing, cardiovascular risk assessments, and immunization programs designed to help seniors maintain their health and catch potential issues early. The Williams Drive location features modern exam rooms, accessible facilities, and a welcoming atmosphere. Their care team includes registered nurses and medical assistants who serve as the first point of contact for appointment scheduling, prescription refills, and health questions between visits. The practice accepts Medicare, Medicare Advantage, and most major insurance plans. New patients are welcome and can typically be seen within one to two weeks of calling.
shortDescription: Internal medicine practice specializing in adult and senior health near Sun City Texas.

name: Lone Star Geriatric Medicine
address: 1401 Medical Pkwy, Suite 220, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Lone Star Geriatric Medicine is one of the few practices in Williamson County dedicated exclusively to the healthcare needs of adults aged 65 and older. Led by Dr. Rebecca Hartfield, a board-certified geriatrician with over 20 years of experience, the practice provides comprehensive medical care tailored to the unique health challenges that come with aging. Their approach goes beyond treating individual symptoms to consider the whole person, including physical health, cognitive function, emotional well-being, and quality of life. Services include comprehensive geriatric assessments, medication management and deprescribing reviews, fall risk evaluations, cognitive screening, advance care planning, and management of complex chronic conditions. Dr. Hartfield and her team take the time to listen, explain, and collaborate with patients and their families to develop care plans that align with each individual's goals and values. The Cedar Park office near Cedar Park Regional Medical Center features extra-wide hallways, comfortable seating, and extended appointment times that allow for thorough evaluations without feeling rushed. The practice coordinates closely with specialists, home health agencies, and community resources throughout western Williamson County to ensure seamless care transitions. Lone Star Geriatric Medicine accepts Medicare, most Medicare Advantage plans, and select commercial insurance. They are currently accepting new patients and encourage families to call for an introductory appointment, which typically lasts 60 to 90 minutes to allow for a thorough medical and social history review.
shortDescription: Dedicated geriatric medicine practice for adults 65+ in Cedar Park.

name: CommUnityCare Health - Hutto
description: CommUnityCare Health Center in Hutto provides accessible, affordable primary care to residents of eastern Williamson County, including many seniors on fixed incomes who might otherwise struggle to access quality healthcare. As a Federally Qualified Health Center, CommUnityCare offers a sliding fee scale based on household size and income, ensuring that cost is never a barrier to essential medical care. Their Hutto clinic provides comprehensive family medicine services including routine check-ups, chronic disease management, preventive screenings, immunizations, women's health services, and behavioral health integration. The clinic's bilingual staff serves the diverse Hutto and Taylor communities with cultural sensitivity and respect. For seniors, their care team offers Medicare wellness visits, diabetes management programs, hypertension monitoring, and connections to community resources like transportation assistance, meal programs, and social services. The modern clinic on Ed Schmidt Boulevard features accessible exam rooms, a patient education area, and coordination with nearby specialty services and the Dell Medical School network. CommUnityCare accepts Medicare, Medicaid, most commercial insurance plans, and offers self-pay options on a sliding scale. Their patient navigators help individuals enroll in insurance programs, apply for prescription assistance, and access other support services. The Hutto location has grown to serve thousands of patients since opening, reflecting the community's need for accessible healthcare in this rapidly developing part of Williamson County. Walk-in appointments may be available, but scheduling ahead is recommended.
shortDescription: Affordable community health center serving Hutto and eastern WilCo with sliding-scale fees.

name: Taylor Family Practice
description: Taylor Family Practice has been a trusted healthcare home for families and seniors in eastern Williamson County for over three decades. Their small-town practice philosophy means patients are known by name, appointments are unhurried, and the doctor-patient relationship is valued above all else. The practice's physicians provide comprehensive family medicine care spanning all ages, with significant experience in managing the health needs of older adults in the Taylor, Hutto, and Thrall communities. Services include annual wellness exams, chronic disease management for conditions like diabetes, COPD, and heart failure, minor in-office procedures, joint injections, and preventive care including cancer screenings and immunizations. Their physician team maintains admitting privileges at nearby hospitals and coordinates with specialists throughout the region when advanced care is needed. The Mallard Lane clinic is a familiar landmark in Taylor, with comfortable facilities that have been updated to include modern electronic health records while maintaining the welcoming atmosphere patients have come to expect over the years. The practice accepts Medicare, most Medicare Advantage plans, and commercial insurance, and their front office staff helps patients understand their coverage and benefits. For seniors in the Taylor area, having a trusted primary care provider close to home means fewer long drives for routine care and a medical team that understands the local community and its resources. name: Endeavor Physical Therapy - Round Rock

Their therapists specialize in orthopedic rehabilitation, balance and fall prevention, post-surgical recovery including joint replacements and spinal procedures, and management of conditions like arthritis, sciatica, and rotator cuff injuries. What sets Endeavor apart is their commitment to one-on-one treatment sessions where patients work directly with a licensed physical therapist for the full duration of each visit, rather than being handed off to aides or technicians. This model ensures individualized attention and faster progress toward recovery goals. The Wyoming Springs clinic features a spacious therapy gym with modern equipment, a private treatment room for manual therapy, and outdoor space for functional training. Many patients from the Forest Creek and Paloma Lake communities appreciate the clinic's convenient location and extended hours, which make it easier to fit therapy sessions into busy schedules. Endeavor's therapists also provide thorough home exercise programs with video demonstrations accessible through a mobile app, empowering patients to continue their recovery between visits. The clinic accepts Medicare, most insurance plans, and offers transparent self-pay rates. Direct access is available in Texas, meaning patients can begin therapy without a physician referral for many conditions, saving time and getting treatment started sooner.

name: Texas Physical Therapy Specialists - Georgetown
description: Texas Physical Therapy Specialists on Williams Drive has earned the trust of Georgetown's senior community through years of exceptional orthopedic and sports rehabilitation care. Their team of doctoral-level physical therapists brings specialized training in geriatric rehabilitation, helping older adults recover from hip and knee replacements, spinal surgeries, fractures, and the effects of conditions like osteoporosis, Parkinson's disease, and stroke. The clinic emphasizes functional outcomes, designing therapy programs that prepare patients for the specific activities they want to return to, whether that's walking the trails at San Gabriel Park, playing pickleball at Georgetown Tennis Center, or simply navigating their home safely and independently. Their evidence-based approach combines manual therapy techniques, therapeutic exercise, neuromuscular re-education, and patient education to address the root causes of pain and movement dysfunction. name: Balance & Mobility Center of WilCo

description: The Balance & Mobility Center of WilCo in Cedar Park is the only physical therapy clinic in western Williamson County focused exclusively on balance disorders, fall prevention, and vestibular rehabilitation. Founded by Dr. Sarah Chen, a neurologic-certified clinical specialist, the center helps adults who experience dizziness, vertigo, unsteadiness, and fear of falling regain their confidence and independence. Their comprehensive evaluation process uses advanced technology including computerized posturography, infrared video goggles for vestibular testing, and standardized balance assessments to identify the specific causes of each patient's balance challenges. Treatment plans are highly individualized, incorporating vestibular rehabilitation exercises, balance retraining, gait training, strength and flexibility work, and education about environmental modifications to reduce fall risk at home. The center's Cedar Park location on Bell Boulevard is easily accessible from Leander, Liberty Hill, and the surrounding communities. Many patients are referred by ear, nose, and throat physicians and neurologists, though a physician referral is not required under Texas direct-access law. The center also offers group balance classes and community fall prevention workshops in partnership with local senior centers and community organizations throughout Williamson County. Their therapists have presented at regional and national conferences on fall prevention strategies for older adults, reflecting the center's commitment to evidence-based practice. The Balance & Mobility Center accepts Medicare, most insurance plans, and offers affordable self-pay options for those without coverage.

Their team of licensed physical therapists treats a wide range of conditions including post-surgical recovery, chronic back and neck pain, joint replacements, rotator cuff repairs, sports injuries, and mobility limitations associated with aging or neurological conditions. The clinic takes a whole-person approach, considering not just the injury or diagnosis but also the patient's lifestyle, goals, and overall health. For seniors, this often means incorporating balance training, gentle strengthening, and functional mobility exercises that translate directly to daily life activities like getting in and out of a car, climbing stairs, or walking through the neighborhood. The FM 1825 clinic is well-equipped with a therapy gym, aquatic therapy pool, and private treatment rooms. Their warm water aquatic therapy program is particularly popular among older adults with arthritis, joint pain, or weight-bearing restrictions, as the buoyancy of water allows movement with less pain and stress on joints. The clinic participates in Medicare and most commercial insurance networks. Their front desk team verifies benefits and provides cost estimates before treatment begins. Pflugerville Physical Therapy also offers a Silver Fitness program, a supervised group exercise class designed specifically for adults over 55 who have completed formal therapy and want to maintain their strength, balance, and flexibility in a supportive setting.

Whether you are recovering from a knee replacement, rehabbing a rotator cuff, managing chronic lower back pain, or working to improve your balance and mobility, the team at Hill Country PT develops a customized treatment plan designed to meet your specific goals. Their US-183 clinic features a spacious treatment area with modern rehabilitation equipment, a manual therapy suite, and a functional training space that simulates real-world environments. Social activities extend beyond the courts with quarterly parties, holiday celebrations, new member mixers, and the popular Dink & Drink happy hours. The Sun City Pickleball Association has produced several regional tournament champions and sends teams to compete in events throughout Central Texas. Their commitment to growing the sport has helped make pickleball the most popular recreational activity in Sun City Texas, surpassing even golf in terms of participation. The attorneys at WilCo Probate guide executors, administrators, and trustees through every step of the process, from filing the initial probate application with the Williamson County Probate Court to final distribution of assets and closing the estate. Their deep familiarity with the local probate court's procedures, judges, and staff allows them to handle matters efficiently and avoid unnecessary delays. Services include independent and dependent probate administration, muniment of title proceedings, small estate affidavits, heirship determinations, trust administration and accounting, and resolution of disputes among beneficiaries. For families dealing with contested wills, disagreements among heirs, or concerns about fiduciary mismanagement, the firm provides skilled litigation representation in the Williamson County courts. Their comprehensive wealth management services include retirement income planning, Social Security optimization, investment management, tax-efficient withdrawal strategies, required minimum distribution planning, and legacy planning. Lead advisor and Certified Financial Planner Robert Chen has spent over two decades helping WilCo families translate their retirement savings into reliable, sustainable income streams. The firm's planning process begins with a thorough discovery meeting where advisors learn about the client's financial picture, lifestyle goals, risk tolerance, and concerns. From there, they develop a personalized financial plan using sophisticated modeling tools that stress-test various scenarios, from market downturns to unexpected healthcare costs. The Chisholm Trail office provides a professional, comfortable setting for client meetings, and the firm offers virtual consultations for clients who prefer remote access. Williamson Wealth Management hosts quarterly client appreciation events and educational workshops on topics like navigating Medicare, understanding Social Security claiming strategies, and managing taxes in retirement. The firm serves clients with investable assets of $500,000 or more and offers a complimentary initial planning session for prospective clients.
shortDescription: Fee-only fiduciary wealth management for retirees and pre-retirees in Round Rock.

name: Georgetown Retirement Planning
description: Georgetown Retirement Planning specializes in helping adults aged 55 and older make confident financial decisions as they transition into and through retirement. Advisor Lisa Blackwood, a Certified Financial Planner and Retirement Income Certified Professional, works exclusively with retirees and those within ten years of retirement, giving the firm deep expertise in the specific challenges and opportunities this life stage presents. Services include comprehensive retirement income planning, Social Security timing analysis, pension benefit evaluation, 401k and IRA rollover guidance, Medicare supplemental insurance coordination, long-term care planning, and estate planning coordination with the client's attorney. Lisa is well-known in the Georgetown and Sun City Texas communities for her educational seminars, which draw standing-room-only crowds at the Georgetown Public Library and Sun City recreation centers. Her straightforward, jargon-free communication style resonates with clients who want to understand their finances without being overwhelmed by Wall Street terminology. The Williams Drive office is welcoming and accessible, and Lisa offers home visits for clients who have difficulty traveling. Georgetown Retirement Planning operates on a transparent fee schedule, with options for hourly planning consultations, flat-fee comprehensive plans, and ongoing assets-under-management relationships. There are no hidden fees, and the firm does not receive commissions on product sales. A complimentary 45-minute introductory meeting gives prospective clients the opportunity to discuss their situation and learn how the firm can help them plan for a comfortable, secure retirement.
shortDescription: Retirement income planning specialist for adults 55+ in Georgetown and Sun City Texas.

name: Lone Star Financial Partners
address: 1460 E Whitestone Blvd, Suite 240, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Lone Star Financial Partners is an independent financial planning firm in Cedar Park that provides personalized financial guidance to individuals and families across western Williamson County. Their team of Certified Financial Planners works with clients at all stages of financial life, with a growing practice focused on serving retirees and those approaching retirement in the Cedar Park, Leander, and Liberty Hill communities. Core services include retirement planning, investment management, Social Security analysis, tax planning coordination, insurance review, and estate planning referrals. The firm prides itself on building lasting relationships with clients, functioning as a trusted partner who helps navigate major financial decisions like when to claim Social Security, how to manage required minimum distributions, whether to downsize or age in place, and how to create a sustainable income stream from accumulated retirement assets. Lone Star Financial Partners uses a goals-based planning approach, starting with what matters most to each client, whether that is maintaining a certain lifestyle, leaving a legacy for children and grandchildren, supporting a favorite charity, or simply having confidence that their money will last. The Whitestone Boulevard office is modern and welcoming, with a small conference room where families can gather for planning meetings. The firm does not have minimum account requirements, making their services accessible to a broader range of clients than many wealth management firms. They offer a complimentary initial consultation and provide a clear explanation of their fee structure before any engagement begins.
shortDescription: Independent financial planning for retirees and pre-retirees in Cedar Park.

name: Edward Jones - Taylor Branch
description: The Edward Jones office on Main Street in Taylor brings nationally recognized financial planning resources to the eastern Williamson County community. Financial advisor James Garcia has served the Taylor, Hutto, and Thrall communities for over 12 years, developing deep relationships with local families and becoming a trusted resource for retirement and investment guidance. James specializes in helping retirees create income strategies from their accumulated savings, manage their investment portfolios, and plan for the financial challenges that come with aging, including healthcare costs, inflation, and the potential need for long-term care. His services include retirement income planning, IRA and 401k rollovers, Social Security timing analysis, annuity evaluation, education savings for grandchildren, and estate planning coordination. As an Edward Jones advisor, James has access to the firm's extensive research capabilities, planning tools, and product platforms, while maintaining the personal, one-on-one service that his clients value. The Main Street office is a familiar presence in downtown Taylor, and James is active in the local community through involvement with the Taylor Chamber of Commerce and local charitable organizations. He regularly hosts client appreciation events and educational workshops at the office and at community venues throughout eastern Williamson County. James offers free portfolio reviews and retirement readiness consultations for prospective clients, providing straightforward assessments of where they stand and practical suggestions for improving their financial outlook.
shortDescription: Local Edward Jones financial advisor serving Taylor and eastern WilCo for 12+ years.

name: Pflugerville Financial Advisors
address: 1100 Grand Ave Pkwy, Suite 200, Pflugerville, TX 78660
description: Pflugerville Financial Advisors is a locally owned financial planning practice that helps families in the Pflugerville and eastern Williamson County area build financial security and plan for a comfortable retirement. Founder and lead advisor Carlos Mendez, a Certified Financial Planner, established the practice with a commitment to making professional financial guidance accessible to working families and retirees who may not meet the high minimums required by many wealth management firms. Services include retirement planning, investment portfolio management, Social Security optimization, 401k and IRA guidance, insurance needs analysis, and basic estate planning coordination. Carlos and his small team take the time to educate clients about their options, using straightforward language and visual tools that make financial concepts easy to understand. The Grand Avenue Parkway office near Stone Hill Town Center provides a convenient, comfortable setting for client meetings, and virtual appointments are available for those who prefer remote consultations. Pflugerville Financial Advisors works with clients of all portfolio sizes, from those just beginning to save for retirement to those managing significant assets accumulated over a lifetime of work. Their transparent fee structure includes hourly planning options for those who need help with specific questions, as well as ongoing advisory relationships for comprehensive financial management. Carlos is an active member of the Pflugerville community, volunteering with local organizations and presenting financial literacy workshops at community centers and libraries throughout eastern WilCo.
shortDescription: Accessible financial planning for families and retirees in Pflugerville.

name: Humana - Georgetown Office
description: Humana's Georgetown office on Williams Drive provides local, in-person support for Medicare beneficiaries throughout northern Williamson County. As one of the nation's largest Medicare Advantage plan providers, Humana offers a range of plan options designed to meet the diverse healthcare needs and budgets of seniors in the Georgetown, Sun City Texas, Jarrell, and Florence communities. Their licensed insurance agents are available for one-on-one consultations to help individuals compare Medicare Advantage plans, Medicare Supplement policies, prescription drug plans, and dental and vision coverage. The Williams Drive office is staffed year-round, not just during open enrollment, ensuring that beneficiaries can get help whenever they have questions about their coverage, need assistance finding in-network providers, or want to understand their benefits more fully. Humana's Medicare Advantage plans in the Williamson County area often include benefits beyond traditional Medicare, such as dental, vision, hearing, fitness memberships through SilverSneakers, over-the-counter allowances, and telehealth services. Their agents can explain these additional benefits and help individuals determine which plan provides the best value for their specific healthcare needs and prescription medications. The office also hosts periodic Medicare educational events and workshops during the Annual Enrollment Period each fall, providing valuable information in a no-pressure environment. For those who cannot visit the office, Humana offers in-home consultations and phone-based enrollment assistance. There is never a fee for consulting with a licensed Humana agent about Medicare plan options.
shortDescription: Local Humana Medicare office with year-round enrollment support on Williams Drive.

name: Baylor Scott & White Health Plan
description: Baylor Scott & White Health Plan offers Medicare Advantage plans that provide Williamson County seniors with comprehensive healthcare coverage through the Baylor Scott & White provider network, one of the largest not-for-profit health systems in Texas. Their Medicare Advantage plans are designed to work seamlessly with the Baylor Scott & White clinics, hospitals, and specialists throughout the region, including the Baylor Scott & White Medical Center in Round Rock and numerous primary care and specialty offices across Williamson County. This integrated approach means better care coordination, streamlined referrals, shared medical records, and often lower out-of-pocket costs compared to traditional Medicare with a separate supplement policy. Plan options include HMO and PPO plans with varying levels of coverage, deductibles, and premium structures, allowing beneficiaries to choose the plan that best fits their healthcare needs and budget. Many plans include additional benefits such as dental coverage, vision care, hearing aids, fitness memberships, transportation to medical appointments, and over-the-counter health product allowances. The health plan's enrollment specialists are available at the Round Rock office and can also meet with individuals at community events, senior centers, and Baylor Scott & White clinic locations throughout the county. They provide clear, honest comparisons of plan options without pressure, helping each person understand how their current doctors and prescriptions align with available plans. Educational seminars are offered throughout the year, with increased frequency during the Annual Enrollment Period from October through December.
shortDescription: Integrated Medicare Advantage plans through the Baylor Scott & White provider network.

name: WilCo Medicare Solutions
address: 2000 S IH-35, Suite G3, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: WilCo Medicare Solutions is an independent Medicare brokerage in Round Rock that represents plans from multiple insurance carriers, giving clients an unbiased comparison of options available in Williamson County. Unlike agents who work for a single insurance company, the licensed brokers at WilCo Medicare Solutions have access to Medicare Advantage plans, Medicare Supplement (Medigap) policies, and Part D prescription drug plans from all major carriers in the market. This independence allows them to recommend the plan that truly fits each client's needs rather than steering toward a particular company's product. Founder and lead broker Patricia Nguyen has specialized in Medicare insurance for over 15 years and is deeply familiar with the healthcare provider landscape in Williamson County. She and her team help clients evaluate how their current doctors, hospitals, and prescriptions align with different plan options, calculate true out-of-pocket costs, and understand the fine print of each policy. Their services are completely free to the client, as brokers are compensated by the insurance carriers. WilCo Medicare Solutions offers appointments at their Round Rock office, in-home consultations throughout Williamson County, and phone or video meetings for remote clients. They provide year-round support, not just during open enrollment, helping with plan changes, coverage questions, appeals, and annual plan reviews to ensure clients always have the best available coverage. The firm hosts free Medicare 101 workshops at libraries and senior centers throughout WilCo.
shortDescription: Independent Medicare brokerage comparing plans from all major carriers in WilCo.

name: Medicare Made Clear - Cedar Park
address: 715 Discovery Blvd, Suite 100, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Medicare Made Clear in Cedar Park is a boutique Medicare advisory practice that takes the confusion out of Medicare enrollment and plan selection. Owner and licensed agent Tom Whitfield left a corporate insurance career to open this practice, driven by a personal mission to help people in his community navigate Medicare without the pressure, jargon, and hidden agendas that too often characterize the insurance industry. Tom works with clients on an individual basis, spending as much time as needed to explain the differences between Original Medicare, Medicare Advantage, Medigap supplements, and Part D drug plans. He creates personalized comparison spreadsheets showing projected annual costs under different plan scenarios, factoring in each client's specific medications, preferred physicians, and anticipated healthcare needs. This data-driven approach helps clients make confident decisions based on facts rather than marketing claims. Medicare Made Clear represents plans from multiple insurance carriers and never charges clients for consultations or enrollment assistance. The Discovery Boulevard office in Cedar Park is easily accessible from US-183, and Tom also provides in-home appointments throughout Cedar Park, Leander, and Liberty Hill for clients who prefer meeting in the comfort of their own home. He offers annual plan reviews for all clients, proactively reaching out each fall to ensure coverage remains optimal as plan benefits and formularies change from year to year. Whether you are turning 65 and new to Medicare or a long-time beneficiary looking for better coverage, Tom provides the clarity and confidence you need.
shortDescription: No-pressure Medicare advisory practice with personalized plan comparisons in Cedar Park.

name: Senior Benefits Group of Texas
address: 1530 Sun City Blvd, Suite 105, Georgetown, TX 78633
description: Senior Benefits Group of Texas is a Georgetown-based agency that helps retirees and seniors navigate not only Medicare but the full landscape of benefits and programs available to them. Their licensed advisors specialize in Medicare Advantage plans, Medicare Supplement insurance, Part D prescription drug plans, dental and vision insurance, long-term care insurance, and Veterans Administration benefits. What distinguishes Senior Benefits Group is their holistic approach: rather than focusing solely on health insurance, they also help clients identify and access additional benefits they may be eligible for, such as extra help programs for prescription costs, Medicaid dual-eligible programs, state pharmaceutical assistance, utility bill discounts, and property tax exemptions available to Texas seniors. Their Sun City Boulevard office is located near the entrance to Sun City Texas, making them a convenient resource for the community's large population of retirees. The firm represents plans from all major carriers and provides unbiased recommendations based on each client's unique needs. There is never a charge for their consultation services. Senior Benefits Group hosts regular educational presentations inside Sun City Texas, at the Georgetown Senior Activity Center, and at other community venues throughout Williamson County. These sessions cover topics like understanding your Medicare options, avoiding Medicare scams, and maximizing your retirement benefits. Their advisors stay current on the latest changes to Medicare regulations and benefit programs, ensuring clients receive accurate, up-to-date guidance.
shortDescription: Comprehensive benefits advisory for seniors near Sun City Texas in Georgetown.

name: Georgetown Gentle Dental
description: Georgetown Gentle Dental has earned a loyal following among seniors and families in Georgetown through their commitment to comfortable, compassionate dental care. Dr. Katherine Mills and her team understand that many adults have dental anxiety or have had negative experiences in the past, and they go the extra mile to create a calming, supportive environment from the moment patients walk through the door. The practice offers comprehensive general and cosmetic dentistry services including exams, cleanings, fillings, crowns, bridges, dentures, dental implant restorations, root canals, and periodontal therapy. For seniors, they provide specialized care addressing dry mouth management, medication-related dental issues, denture fittings and adjustments, and oral cancer screenings. Their Rivery Boulevard office near Wolf Ranch features modern technology including digital X-rays with reduced radiation, intraoral cameras, and same-day crown fabrication for many restorations. Comfort amenities include heated neck pillows, blankets, noise-canceling headphones, and TVs mounted above treatment chairs. Georgetown Gentle Dental accepts Medicare Advantage plans that include dental benefits, as well as most commercial dental insurance plans. They also offer an in-house dental savings plan for uninsured patients that provides discounts on all services for an affordable annual membership fee. The practice is conveniently located near the Wolf Ranch shopping area, making it easy to combine a dental appointment with errands. Their friendly front desk team handles insurance verification and provides cost estimates before any treatment begins.
shortDescription: Anxiety-friendly dental practice with modern technology near Wolf Ranch in Georgetown.

deal.title: New Patient Special
deal.detail: Exam, X-rays, and cleaning for $99, through April 2026

name: Round Rock Denture & Implant Center
address: 1700 E Palm Valley Blvd, Suite 300, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Round Rock Denture & Implant Center is a specialized dental practice focused on tooth replacement solutions for adults throughout Williamson County. Their team of prosthodontists and implant specialists provides a full range of services including traditional dentures, implant-supported dentures, single dental implants, All-on-4 implant procedures, and same-day tooth extractions with immediate denture placement. For seniors who are living with missing teeth, ill-fitting dentures, or chronic dental pain, the center offers a path to restored function, comfort, and confidence. Their Palm Valley Boulevard office features an on-site dental laboratory, which allows for faster turnaround times on dentures and custom prosthetics compared to practices that outsource lab work. This in-house capability means same-day denture repairs and relines are often possible, minimizing the inconvenience of being without teeth. The center's team takes time to educate each patient about their options, explaining the pros, cons, and costs of different tooth replacement approaches so they can make an informed decision. Financing options are available through CareCredit and in-house payment plans, making quality dental care accessible regardless of insurance status. The center accepts most dental insurance plans and will verify benefits before treatment. Many patients travel from across the county to visit this practice, drawn by their specialization, competitive pricing, and the comfort of working with providers who focus exclusively on tooth replacement every day. Free consultations are available for patients considering dentures or dental implants.
shortDescription: Specialized denture and dental implant center with on-site lab in Round Rock.

name: Leander Family Dentistry
description: Leander Family Dentistry provides warm, professional dental care for the entire family, with a strong focus on the unique oral health needs of adults and seniors. Dr. Michael Tran has practiced in the Leander community for over 10 years, building trust through consistent quality care, honest communication, and a genuine concern for his patients' comfort and well-being. The practice offers preventive care, restorative dentistry, periodontal treatment, dentures and partials, crowns, bridges, and cosmetic services. Dr. Tran has completed advanced training in geriatric dentistry and understands the connections between oral health and systemic conditions like diabetes, heart disease, and osteoporosis. He and his hygienists take a thorough approach to oral cancer screening, gum disease assessment, and monitoring the effects of common medications on dental health. The US-183 office in central Leander is modern and accessible, with digital imaging technology, comfortable treatment rooms, and a friendly team that puts nervous patients at ease. Leander Family Dentistry accepts most dental insurance plans and offers an affordable in-house membership plan for patients without insurance, which covers two cleanings, exams, and X-rays per year plus discounts on additional treatment. The practice prides itself on minimal wait times and a relaxed pace that allows Dr. Tran to answer questions and explain treatment recommendations thoroughly. For seniors in the Crystal Falls, Sarita Valley, and Mason Creek communities, Leander Family Dentistry provides a convenient, high-quality dental home close to where they live.
shortDescription: Trusted family dental practice with geriatric dentistry expertise in Leander.

name: Georgetown Counseling & Wellness
description: Georgetown Counseling & Wellness provides compassionate mental health services to adults and seniors throughout Williamson County, with specialized expertise in the emotional challenges that often accompany aging, retirement, caregiving, grief, and life transitions. Their team of licensed professional counselors and licensed clinical social workers offers individual therapy, couples counseling, family therapy, and group support sessions in a warm, confidential setting on Williams Drive. Several therapists on staff have advanced training in geriatric mental health, understanding that issues like depression, anxiety, loneliness, grief after the loss of a spouse or friends, adjustment to retirement, and coping with chronic health conditions require sensitive, age-informed approaches. The practice also offers caregiver support counseling for family members who are providing care to an aging parent or spouse, helping them manage the stress, guilt, and emotional exhaustion that often accompany the caregiving role. Georgetown Counseling & Wellness accepts Medicare, Medicaid, and most commercial insurance plans, and offers a sliding fee scale for uninsured clients based on financial need. Telehealth appointments are available for clients who prefer virtual sessions or have difficulty traveling to the office. The practice maintains evening hours several days per week to accommodate various schedules. Located near the intersection of Williams Drive and Shell Road, the office is easily accessible from Georgetown, Sun City Texas, and the surrounding communities. New clients can typically be seen within one week of their initial call, and crisis referrals are handled promptly.
shortDescription: Specialized counseling for seniors, caregivers, and adults navigating life transitions.

name: Bluebonnet Mental Health - Round Rock
address: 1009 N Georgetown St, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Bluebonnet Trails Community Services is Williamson County's designated community mental health center, providing essential psychiatric and counseling services to adults of all ages, including many seniors who face barriers to accessing private mental healthcare. Their Round Rock clinic on Georgetown Street offers psychiatric evaluations, medication management, individual and group counseling, crisis intervention, and case management services. For older adults, Bluebonnet Trails provides specialized services addressing depression, anxiety, adjustment disorders, grief, trauma, and co-occurring substance use issues. Their psychiatric providers are experienced in managing medications for seniors, taking into account the complexity of treating mental health conditions alongside physical health issues and existing medication regimens. As a publicly funded community mental health center, Bluebonnet Trails operates on a sliding fee scale, ensuring that financial limitations do not prevent anyone from receiving the care they need. They accept Medicare, Medicaid, and most commercial insurance, and no one is turned away for inability to pay. The center also provides outreach services to homebound seniors and partners with local senior centers, home health agencies, and hospitals to identify and serve older adults who may be struggling silently with mental health challenges. Bluebonnet Trails' case managers can connect clients with transportation, housing assistance, food programs, and other social services throughout Williamson County. The Round Rock clinic is part of a larger network of Bluebonnet Trails locations serving a multi-county region in Central Texas.
shortDescription: Community mental health center with affordable psychiatric and counseling services.

name: Silver Lining Therapy Services
description: Silver Lining Therapy Services in Pflugerville is a counseling practice focused specifically on the mental health and emotional well-being of adults over 55. Therapist and founder Dr. Karen Okafor, a licensed psychologist with a specialty in geropsychology, recognized that many traditional therapy practices are not designed to address the distinct concerns of older adults, from the identity shifts of retirement to the accumulated grief of losing friends and family members, to the anxiety of managing chronic health conditions or facing cognitive changes. At Silver Lining, every aspect of the practice is tailored to the needs of mature clients, from the comfortable, home-like office environment to the extended session times that allow for deeper exploration without feeling rushed. Dr. Okafor offers individual therapy for depression, anxiety, grief, life transitions, and adjustment to health changes, as well as couples counseling for partners navigating the challenges of aging together. She also provides cognitive screening assessments for individuals and families who have concerns about memory or cognitive function, with referrals to neurologists when further evaluation is indicated. Silver Lining accepts Medicare and most Medicare Advantage plans, and offers telehealth sessions for clients throughout Williamson County who cannot easily travel to the office. The Windermere Drive location in Pflugerville is accessible and has ample parking. Dr. Okafor is passionate about reducing the stigma around mental health care for older adults and frequently speaks at community events and support groups on topics related to emotional wellness and healthy aging.
shortDescription: Geriatric psychology practice focused on adults 55+ in Pflugerville.

name: Georgetown Pharmacy & Medical Supply
description: Georgetown Pharmacy & Medical Supply is an independent, locally owned pharmacy that has served the Georgetown community for over 20 years, providing personalized pharmaceutical care with a level of service that large chain pharmacies simply cannot match. Their pharmacists take the time to review each patient's complete medication profile, check for potential drug interactions, explain side effects, and answer questions in detail. For seniors managing multiple prescriptions, this attentive approach is invaluable and has earned the pharmacy a devoted following among Sun City Texas residents and Georgetown families. Beyond prescription dispensing, the pharmacy offers comprehensive services including medication synchronization, automatic refills, blister packaging for complex medication regimens, immunizations, medication therapy management consultations, and free local delivery.
