Their medical supply department carries durable medical equipment including walkers, rollators, wheelchairs, bathroom safety equipment, compression stockings, wound care supplies, and blood pressure monitors, with knowledgeable staff who can help select the right products and process Medicare and insurance claims for covered equipment. The Williams Drive location features a comfortable waiting area, private consultation room, and drive-through window for added convenience. Georgetown Pharmacy accepts Medicare Part D, Medicaid, and virtually all commercial prescription insurance plans. Their pharmacists also help patients identify manufacturer discount programs and patient assistance programs that can significantly reduce out-of-pocket prescription costs. This is a pharmacy where the staff knows your name and genuinely cares about your health and well-being.
shortDescription: Independent pharmacy with personalized care, delivery, and medical supplies in Georgetown.

name: WilCo Home Medical Equipment
address: 2051 Gattis School Rd, Suite 500, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: WilCo Home Medical Equipment is a locally owned durable medical equipment provider serving patients throughout Williamson County who need assistive devices and medical supplies for safe, comfortable living at home. Their showroom on Gattis School Road in Round Rock displays a wide selection of mobility aids including manual and power wheelchairs, scooters, walkers, rollators, and transport chairs. They also carry hospital beds, lift chairs, patient lifts, bathroom safety equipment, oxygen concentrators, CPAP machines, compression garments, orthopedic braces, and wound care supplies. What sets WilCo Home Medical Equipment apart is their consultative approach: trained staff members work directly with each customer to assess their needs, demonstrate equipment options, ensure proper fit and function, and coordinate with physicians on required prescriptions and documentation. They handle Medicare and insurance billing on behalf of their customers, taking the paperwork burden off patients and families. The company offers free delivery, setup, and training on all major equipment within Williamson County, and their technicians provide ongoing maintenance and repair services. Many referrals come from local hospitals, rehabilitation facilities, and home health agencies who trust WilCo HME to provide reliable equipment and responsive service. The Gattis School Road showroom is accessible and features a comfortable testing area where customers can try different products before making a decision. Weekend hours on Saturday mornings accommodate those who cannot visit during the work week.
shortDescription: Local durable medical equipment provider with showroom and free delivery in Round Rock.

name: Heart of Texas Hospice - WilCo
description: Heart of Texas Hospice provides compassionate end-of-life care to patients and families throughout Williamson County, delivering comfort, dignity, and support during one of life's most challenging journeys. Their interdisciplinary team includes physicians, registered nurses, certified nursing assistants, social workers, chaplains, and trained volunteers who work together to address the physical, emotional, spiritual, and practical needs of patients with life-limiting illnesses. Care is provided wherever the patient calls home, whether that is a private residence, assisted living community, nursing facility, or hospital. Heart of Texas Hospice emphasizes pain and symptom management, ensuring patients are as comfortable as possible while maintaining alertness and quality of life. Their nursing staff is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, providing families with the reassurance that expert help is always just a phone call away. Social workers help families navigate emotional challenges, access community resources, and plan for practical needs. The chaplaincy program provides non-denominational spiritual support tailored to each patient's beliefs and wishes. Bereavement services extend for 13 months after a patient's passing, offering grief support groups, individual counseling, and community memorial services for surviving family members. Heart of Texas Hospice is Medicare-certified and accepts Medicaid and most insurance plans. Under the Medicare Hospice Benefit, most services, medications, equipment, and supplies related to the hospice diagnosis are covered at no cost to the patient. The Georgetown office coordinates care across the county, with teams dedicated to specific geographic areas for continuity.
shortDescription: Compassionate hospice care with 24/7 support throughout Williamson County.

name: Compassion Care Palliative Medicine
address: 2400 Round Rock Ave, Suite 200, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Compassion Care Palliative Medicine provides specialized palliative care services to adults living with serious illnesses throughout Williamson County. Unlike hospice, which is for patients in the final months of life, palliative care can begin at any point after a serious diagnosis and is provided alongside curative treatments. Their board-certified palliative medicine physicians and nurse practitioners focus on relieving symptoms, managing pain, addressing side effects of treatment, and improving quality of life for patients with conditions such as cancer, heart failure, COPD, kidney disease, and neurological disorders. The practice works in close partnership with each patient's primary care physician and specialists, providing an additional layer of support rather than replacing existing care. Compassion Care's approach centers on thorough symptom assessment, aggressive but thoughtful pain management, advance care planning, and careful attention to the emotional and psychological impact of living with a serious illness. Their team also provides guidance and support to family caregivers, helping them understand the disease process, manage care at home, and navigate difficult decisions. The Round Rock Avenue office provides a comfortable, accessible setting for appointments, and home visits are available for patients who have difficulty traveling. Compassion Care accepts Medicare, most insurance plans, and works with each patient to minimize financial barriers to care. Referrals can come from physicians, hospitals, or directly from patients and families who recognize the need for specialized symptom management and support.
shortDescription: Palliative medicine for adults with serious illnesses, working alongside existing care teams.

name: SilverSneakers at Gold's Gym Round Rock
description: Gold's Gym in Round Rock participates in the SilverSneakers fitness program, providing eligible Medicare beneficiaries with a free gym membership that includes full access to the facility's equipment, classes, and amenities. For seniors looking for an affordable way to stay active, SilverSneakers at Gold's Gym offers a comprehensive fitness experience without the typical gym membership cost. The Round Rock location features a full weight room, cardio equipment, functional training area, group exercise studio, swimming pool, sauna, and locker rooms. SilverSneakers classes held at the gym include Classic, Circuit, Yoga, and Stability formats, all designed specifically for active older adults and taught by certified SilverSneakers instructors who understand how to modify movements for various fitness levels and physical limitations. Beyond SilverSneakers classes, members can participate in any of Gold's Gym regular group fitness classes, including water aerobics, yoga, cycling, and strength training. The gym's trained staff can also provide orientation sessions to help new members learn how to use equipment safely and effectively. The IH-35 location is convenient for residents throughout central Williamson County, with ample parking and accessible facilities. To determine SilverSneakers eligibility, seniors can check with their Medicare Advantage plan or visit the SilverSneakers website. Gold's Gym also offers traditional memberships at competitive rates for those who do not have SilverSneakers coverage. The gym's welcoming atmosphere and diverse membership make it a great place for active adults to maintain their fitness and meet like-minded individuals.
shortDescription: Free gym access for eligible Medicare members through SilverSneakers in Round Rock.

name: Active Life Fitness Center
address: 3500 Shell Rd, Suite A, Georgetown, TX 78628
description: Active Life Fitness Center in Georgetown is designed specifically for adults over 50, creating a welcoming, supportive environment where members can improve their strength, balance, flexibility, and cardiovascular health at their own pace. Unlike traditional gyms that cater primarily to younger demographics, Active Life has curated its equipment, classes, and programming with the mature adult in mind. The facility features a selection of resistance machines with clear instructions and adjustable settings, free weights, recumbent bikes, ellipticals, treadmills with handrails, and a dedicated stretching and balance training area. Group classes are the heart of the Active Life experience, with offerings including chair fitness, gentle yoga, water aerobics in their heated indoor pool, strength training for beginners, balance and stability, line dancing, and cardio circuits. All classes are led by certified instructors trained in senior fitness who provide modifications and encouragement to help every participant succeed. The center's Shell Road location near Berry Creek is especially convenient for Georgetown and Sun City Texas residents. Active Life accepts SilverSneakers and Silver&Fit memberships, and offers affordable monthly rates for direct-pay members with no long-term contracts. Personal training sessions are available for members who want individualized guidance on exercise programs tailored to their specific health conditions, mobility limitations, or fitness goals. The center regularly hosts wellness workshops, health screenings with local providers, and social events that foster a strong sense of community among members.
shortDescription: Fitness center designed specifically for adults 50+ with classes, pool, and personal training.

deal.title: Free Week Trial
deal.detail: Full access for 7 days, no obligation

name: Cedar Park Recreation Center
description: Cedar Park Recreation Center is a city-operated fitness and recreation facility that offers outstanding value for active adults in western Williamson County. The center features a fully equipped fitness room with cardio machines, weight training equipment, and functional training space, as well as a gymnasium, indoor walking track, group exercise studio, and a leisure pool with lap lanes and a warm water therapy area. For seniors, the recreation center provides a robust schedule of age-appropriate fitness classes including Silver Sneakers, water aerobics, yoga, Pilates, line dancing, and gentle strength training. Many of these classes are included with membership, and drop-in fees are available for occasional visitors. The warm water therapy pool is especially popular among older adults with arthritis, joint pain, or mobility limitations, as the heated water provides a soothing environment for low-impact exercise and rehabilitation. Cedar Park residents enjoy discounted membership rates, and the center offers reduced rates for seniors aged 55 and older, making it one of the most affordable fitness options in the area. The Main Street location in downtown Cedar Park is easily accessible and features ample parking, accessible locker rooms, and a friendly, helpful staff. The recreation center also hosts community events, wellness fairs, and special programming throughout the year. For seniors looking for an affordable, well-equipped facility with a welcoming atmosphere and diverse programming, Cedar Park Recreation Center is an excellent choice.
shortDescription: City recreation center with pool, fitness room, and affordable senior rates in Cedar Park.

name: YMCA of Greater Williamson County
address: 1812 N Mays St, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: The YMCA of Greater Williamson County on Mays Street in Round Rock is a cornerstone community fitness facility that serves members of all ages with particular strength in programming for active adults and seniors. The facility features a modern fitness center, indoor lap pool, warm water therapy pool, gymnasium, racquetball courts, indoor cycling studio, group exercise rooms, and an outdoor playground area. For seniors, the Y offers an extensive menu of group fitness classes including SilverSneakers, water aerobics, gentle yoga, tai chi, strength training for older adults, and arthritis-friendly aquatic exercise. Personal training services are available for members who want customized workout plans that account for their specific health conditions, limitations, and goals. The YMCA's mission-driven approach means they are committed to making fitness accessible to everyone, regardless of income. Their financial assistance program ensures that no one is turned away due to inability to pay, and senior memberships are offered at reduced rates. The Mays Street Y is more than just a gym, it is a community hub where retirees gather for coffee, socialize before and after classes, and participate in volunteer activities. The Y also offers a chronic disease prevention program, diabetes prevention classes, and blood pressure self-monitoring stations. Many local physicians recommend the YMCA to their senior patients as a supportive environment for improving cardiovascular health, maintaining muscle mass, and staying socially connected. SilverSneakers and Silver&Fit memberships are accepted.
shortDescription: Community YMCA with extensive senior fitness programs, pools, and financial assistance.

name: FitOver50 Studio
description: FitOver50 Studio is a boutique fitness studio in Pflugerville created exclusively for adults aged 50 and older. Owner and certified personal trainer Diane Kessler designed the studio to fill a gap she noticed in the local fitness landscape: a small, intimate, non-intimidating space where mature adults could exercise with confidence, receive expert guidance, and build genuine friendships with fellow members. The studio offers small group training classes limited to 12 participants, ensuring each member receives personalized attention and proper form coaching. Class formats include total body strength, core and balance, flexibility and mobility, cardio intervals adapted for all fitness levels, and functional fitness circuits that train movements needed for everyday life. Diane and her team of certified trainers specialize in working with adults who have joint replacements, arthritis, osteoporosis, balance concerns, or who are simply new to exercise and unsure where to start. The studio atmosphere is warm, encouraging, and completely free of the loud music and competitive energy found in many mainstream gyms. Located along FM 1825 in Pflugerville, the studio is accessible from Pflugerville, Hutto, and eastern Round Rock. Class packages and monthly unlimited memberships are available at competitive rates, and a free trial class is offered to all prospective members. Many members describe FitOver50 as the first gym where they have ever felt truly comfortable, and the strong community bonds formed in the studio extend to social outings, holiday gatherings, and lasting friendships.
shortDescription: Intimate boutique fitness studio exclusively for adults 50+ in Pflugerville.

name: Sun City Texas Golf Club
description: Sun City Texas Golf Club features three beautifully maintained 18-hole championship golf courses within the Sun City Texas active adult community in Georgetown. The courses, designed by renowned architects, wind through the rolling hills and scenic landscapes of the Texas Hill Country, offering challenging play for golfers of all skill levels alongside breathtaking views. The three courses include Cowan Creek, designed by Billy Casper and Greg Nash, White Wing, designed by Greg Norman, and Legacy Hills, a par-three executive course perfect for shorter games and practice rounds. Sun City Golf Club provides a full-service golf experience with a well-stocked pro shop, driving range, practice greens, club fitting services, and a team of PGA professionals who offer individual and group lessons tailored to the needs of adult golfers. The men's and women's golf associations organize regular tournaments, scrambles, and social events that make up a vibrant golf community. The clubhouse features a restaurant and bar where golfers can relax after their rounds, enjoy the Hill Country views from the patio, and socialize with friends. While the courses are primarily for Sun City residents and their guests, limited public access is available at select times. The golf maintenance team is nationally recognized for their course conditioning, and the greens, fairways, and bunkers are consistently praised by players. For retirees who love golf, Sun City Texas Golf Club offers an unparalleled combination of quality courses, active golf community, and stunning natural setting.
shortDescription: Three championship courses in the Sun City Texas 55+ community in Georgetown.

name: Teravista Golf Club
address: 4333 Teravista Club Dr, Round Rock, TX 78665
description: Teravista Golf Club is a premier public golf course in Round Rock that offers an accessible yet challenging golfing experience amid the rolling terrain of eastern Williamson County. The 18-hole championship course was designed to provide a fair test for all skill levels, with multiple tee boxes that allow golfers to choose the distance that matches their ability. The well-manicured fairways, true-rolling greens, and strategically placed bunkers and water features create an enjoyable round that rewards good shot-making while remaining playable for recreational golfers. For retirees and active adults, Teravista offers excellent weekday rates, senior discounts, and loyalty programs that make regular play affordable. The club's practice facilities include a driving range, chipping area, and putting green where golfers can warm up before their round or work on specific aspects of their game. PGA professionals on staff provide individual and group lessons, with many lesson packages designed specifically for adult beginners and intermediate players who want to improve their skills and enjoy the game more fully. The clubhouse features a full-service restaurant, bar, and event space with panoramic views of the course. Teravista Golf Club is home to several senior men's and women's golf leagues that play regular weekly rounds and host seasonal tournaments. The course is conveniently located near the intersection of University Boulevard and SH-130, making it easily accessible from Round Rock, Pflugerville, Hutto, and the surrounding communities.
shortDescription: Public championship golf course with senior rates and leagues in Round Rock.

deal.title: Weekday Senior Rate
deal.detail: Seniors 60+ play for $39 Mon-Fri before 2 PM

name: Gentle Path Yoga Studio
description: Gentle Path Yoga Studio is tucked into a charming historic space just off the Georgetown Square, offering yoga classes specifically designed for adults over 50 and those with limited mobility or chronic conditions. Founded by registered yoga therapist Elena Vasquez, the studio focuses on gentle Hatha yoga, chair yoga, restorative yoga, and therapeutic yoga practices that improve flexibility, balance, strength, and stress management without the intensity or competitive atmosphere found in many contemporary yoga studios. Elena's classes are paced to allow time for proper alignment, breath awareness, and the use of props like blocks, straps, and bolsters that make poses accessible to every body. Many Sun City Texas residents have made Gentle Path their go-to yoga studio, appreciating Elena's warm teaching style, her deep understanding of age-related physical changes, and the studio's intimate, peaceful atmosphere. Class sizes are limited to 15 students, ensuring individual attention and a sense of community among regular participants. The studio also offers specialized workshops on yoga for arthritis, yoga for better sleep, breathing techniques for stress relief, and meditation practices for mental clarity. Private yoga therapy sessions are available for individuals with specific health goals or conditions that benefit from a customized approach. Drop-in rates and affordable class packages make it easy to incorporate yoga into your weekly routine. The downtown Georgetown location is a pleasant destination that pairs nicely with a visit to the Square's shops and restaurants after class.
shortDescription: Gentle yoga for adults 50+ in a charming studio near the Georgetown Square.

name: WilCo Tai Chi & Qigong Center
address: 301 W Main St, Suite 200, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: WilCo Tai Chi & Qigong Center in downtown Round Rock offers traditional tai chi and qigong instruction in a calm, welcoming studio environment. Instructor David Liang, a certified tai chi instructor with over 25 years of practice, teaches Yang-style tai chi and medical qigong, both proven through research to improve balance, reduce fall risk, lower blood pressure, relieve chronic pain, and promote mental calm in older adults. Classes are structured for beginners through advanced practitioners, with most students being active adults and retirees who are drawn to tai chi's gentle, flowing movements and its profound health benefits. David's teaching approach emphasizes proper body mechanics, mindful breathing, and gradual progression, making tai chi accessible even to those with limited mobility or chronic conditions. The Main Street studio features a hardwood floor, natural lighting, and a peaceful atmosphere that supports focused practice. Small class sizes of eight to twelve students allow David to provide individual guidance and corrections. The center also offers outdoor tai chi sessions in Centennial Plaza Park during temperate months, allowing practitioners to connect with nature while moving through the forms. Regular workshops explore specific topics like tai chi for arthritis, balance improvement, and stress reduction. WilCo Tai Chi & Qigong Center provides an affordable path to improved physical and mental health through practices that have been refined over centuries. Drop-in classes are welcome, and new student introductory packages offer excellent value for those ready to begin their tai chi journey.
shortDescription: Traditional tai chi and qigong instruction for balance and wellness in Round Rock.

deal.title: Intro Package
deal.detail: 4 classes for $25 for new students

name: WilCo Elder Law Center
description: WilCo Elder Law Center is a Georgetown practice devoted exclusively to legal issues affecting older adults and their families. Attorney Linda Rawlings, a certified elder law attorney by the National Elder Law Foundation, brings specialized knowledge in Medicaid planning, Veterans benefits, guardianship proceedings, special needs trusts, long-term care planning, and protection against elder financial abuse. Her practice helps families navigate the often-confusing intersection of legal, financial, and healthcare systems that affect seniors, providing clarity and advocacy at every step. Whether a family needs to protect assets before a loved one enters a nursing home, apply for VA Aid & Attendance benefits, establish a guardianship for an incapacitated family member, or create a comprehensive plan that addresses both legal and financial concerns of aging, WilCo Elder Law Center provides expert guidance rooted in compassion and deep experience. The Church Street office near the Williamson County Courthouse is conveniently located for families who may also have business at the courthouse for probate or guardianship matters. Linda frequently presents educational workshops at Sun City Texas, the Georgetown Senior Activity Center, and local assisted living communities, covering topics like protecting yourself from scams, understanding Medicaid eligibility rules, and planning for long-term care costs. Her transparent fee structure is discussed during the initial consultation, which is offered at no charge. WilCo Elder Law Center is a trusted referral partner for many geriatric care managers, social workers, and healthcare providers throughout Williamson County.
shortDescription: Certified elder law attorney specializing in Medicaid planning and guardianship in Georgetown.

name: Round Rock Elder Care Law
address: 1 Chisholm Trail, Suite 1500, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Round Rock Elder Care Law provides experienced legal representation for seniors and their families across central Williamson County. Attorney Brian Hartley focuses his practice on the unique legal needs that arise as people age, including long-term care planning, Medicaid eligibility and applications, powers of attorney, guardianship proceedings, elder abuse prevention, and coordination with estate planning attorneys on comprehensive aging plans. Brian's approach is practical and family-centered, recognizing that legal decisions about aging parents or spouses are deeply personal and often emotionally charged. He takes the time to explain options clearly, answer every question, and help families make decisions they feel good about. The firm's Chisholm Trail office in Round Rock provides a comfortable, private setting for sensitive family discussions. Brian works collaboratively with geriatric care managers, social workers, financial advisors, and healthcare providers to ensure that legal planning integrates smoothly with the client's broader care and financial plans. His familiarity with the Williamson County court system is particularly valuable for guardianship cases, where knowledge of local procedures and relationships with court staff can help expedite proceedings. Round Rock Elder Care Law offers an initial consultation at a reduced fee, allowing families to explore their situation and understand their legal options before committing to full representation. The firm also provides educational resources on its website and participates in community outreach events focused on elder law topics throughout the Round Rock area.
shortDescription: Practical elder law services including Medicaid and guardianship in Round Rock.

name: Senior Tax Solutions
address: 4230 Williams Dr, Suite B, Georgetown, TX 78628
description: Senior Tax Solutions on Williams Drive in Georgetown specializes in tax preparation and planning for retirees and seniors throughout Williamson County. Owner and enrolled agent Patricia Kim has spent over 18 years preparing tax returns for individuals and couples in retirement, developing deep expertise in the tax issues unique to this stage of life. Her practice handles the full range of senior tax situations including Social Security taxation, pension and annuity income, required minimum distributions from IRAs and 401k plans, capital gains from investment portfolio rebalancing, rental property income, and the tax implications of selling a family home. Patricia also advises clients on strategies to minimize their tax burden in retirement, such as Roth conversion planning, charitable giving strategies including qualified charitable distributions, and timing of income to manage Medicare premium surcharges. The Williams Drive office near Sun City Texas makes the practice easily accessible for the large retiree community in Georgetown, and Saturday appointments are available during tax season for clients who prefer weekend meetings. Senior Tax Solutions offers year-round tax planning consultations in addition to return preparation, helping clients make informed financial decisions throughout the year rather than just at filing time. Their fees are transparent and competitive, with flat pricing based on return complexity rather than hourly rates. Patricia also coordinates regularly with clients' financial advisors and estate planning attorneys to ensure tax strategies align with broader financial goals. AARP Tax-Aide volunteer referrals are also available for qualifying low-income seniors.
shortDescription: Tax preparation and planning specialist for retirees near Sun City Texas.

deal.title: New Client Discount
deal.detail: $50 off first tax return, through April 2026

name: H&R Block - Round Rock Senior Services
address: 200 E Main St, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: The H&R Block office on Main Street in downtown Round Rock provides professional tax preparation services with extended hours and weekend availability that make it convenient for seniors and retirees throughout central Williamson County. Their experienced tax professionals are trained to handle the specific tax situations common among retirees, including Social Security income, pension distributions, investment income, required minimum distributions, and property tax deductions. The office offers both in-person appointments and virtual options for those who prefer to meet from the comfort of their home. H&R Block's accuracy guarantee and audit support give clients confidence that their returns are prepared correctly and that help is available if the IRS has questions. The downtown Round Rock location is accessible and familiar, situated near the historic Main Street district with convenient parking. During tax season, the office maintains extended hours including evenings and weekends, accommodating a variety of schedules. Their tax professionals can also help clients with tax planning throughout the year, offering guidance on estimated tax payments, life event impacts on taxes, and strategies to reduce tax liability in future years. H&R Block offers special pricing for simple returns and a price match guarantee for comparable services. For seniors on tight budgets, the office can also provide information about free tax preparation options available through AARP Tax-Aide and Volunteer Income Tax Assistance programs operating in Williamson County. Walk-in service is available during regular hours, though appointments are recommended during peak season.
shortDescription: Convenient tax preparation with extended hours in downtown Round Rock.

name: Texas Reverse Mortgage Advisors
address: 1 Chisholm Trail, Suite 800, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Texas Reverse Mortgage Advisors provides education, guidance, and origination services for homeowners aged 62 and older throughout Williamson County who are considering a Home Equity Conversion Mortgage, commonly known as a reverse mortgage. Their team of licensed mortgage professionals specializes exclusively in reverse mortgages, bringing focused expertise to a financial product that is often misunderstood and sometimes misrepresented. Rather than leading with a sales pitch, Texas Reverse Mortgage Advisors begins every client relationship with a thorough educational consultation where they explain how reverse mortgages work, what they cost, what obligations the homeowner retains, and whether a reverse mortgage is truly appropriate for the client's situation. They are transparent about the cases where a reverse mortgage is not the right solution, and will recommend alternative options when warranted. For homeowners who determine that a reverse mortgage is a good fit, the team handles all aspects of the origination process, from application through closing, with clear communication at every stage. Their Round Rock office serves clients across Williamson County, and home visits are available for initial consultations. Texas Reverse Mortgage Advisors is FHA-approved and adheres to all HUD counseling requirements. All clients must complete HUD-approved reverse mortgage counseling before proceeding, and the firm provides referrals to approved counselors in the area. Their goal is to ensure that every homeowner who chooses a reverse mortgage does so with full understanding and confidence in their decision.
shortDescription: Education-first reverse mortgage specialists for homeowners 62+ in Williamson County.

name: Georgetown Recreation Center Pool
description: Georgetown Recreation Center offers an excellent aquatic program for seniors and active adults, featuring a heated indoor lap pool and a warm water therapy pool that stays at a comfortable 86-88 degrees year-round. The warm water pool is specifically designed for therapeutic exercise, gentle aquatic fitness, and relaxation, making it a favorite among older adults with arthritis, back pain, or joint conditions who benefit from exercising in a low-impact, buoyant environment. The aquatics schedule includes a robust lineup of classes tailored to seniors, including water aerobics, aqua Zumba, arthritis foundation aquatic exercise, lap swimming times, and open recreational swim periods. Certified aquatic instructors lead classes that improve cardiovascular fitness, muscle strength, flexibility, and balance, all while being gentle on the body. The lap pool accommodates swimmers who want to swim laps for exercise, with dedicated lane times during morning hours that attract a regular group of fitness-minded retirees. The recreation center also offers swim lessons for adults who never learned to swim or want to improve their skills, providing a judgment-free environment to build water confidence. Georgetown residents aged 55 and older enjoy discounted membership rates, and SilverSneakers and Silver&Fit memberships may cover pool access through qualifying Medicare Advantage plans. The N Austin Avenue facility features accessible changing rooms, gradual entry into the pools, and lift equipment for those with mobility limitations. Beyond aquatics, the recreation center houses a fitness room, gymnasium, and community meeting spaces.
shortDescription: Heated indoor pools with senior water aerobics and therapy programs in Georgetown.

name: Round Rock Aquatic Center
description: Round Rock Aquatic Center on Deepwood Drive provides year-round swimming and aquatic fitness opportunities for residents of all ages, with a strong emphasis on programming for active adults and seniors. The facility features an indoor heated pool with lap lanes, a warm water therapy and activity pool, and during summer months, an outdoor leisure pool. The aquatics department offers a full schedule of classes including water walking, aqua aerobics, deep water fitness, arthritis-friendly water exercise, and adult swim lessons. Early morning lap swim times are especially popular among retirees who enjoy starting their day with low-impact cardiovascular exercise in the pool. The warm water pool is maintained at therapeutic temperatures and provides an ideal environment for gentle movement, rehabilitation exercises, and socializing with fellow swimmers. Round Rock's Parks and Recreation Department runs the facility with a commitment to accessibility and affordability. Senior rates are available for residents aged 55 and older, and multi-visit punch cards offer additional savings for regular swimmers. The aquatic center's staff includes Red Cross-certified lifeguards and certified aquatic fitness instructors who prioritize safety while maintaining a friendly, encouraging atmosphere. The Deepwood Drive location is centrally situated in Round Rock with easy access from the surrounding residential neighborhoods. Accessible features include a ramp entry into the pool, pool lifts, accessible locker rooms and showers, and reserved accessible parking. The aquatic center is a welcoming destination for seniors looking to maintain their fitness, recover from injury, or simply enjoy the therapeutic benefits of time in the water.
shortDescription: Year-round indoor aquatic center with senior rates and warm water therapy pool.

name: WilCo Senior Hiking Club
description: The WilCo Senior Hiking Club brings together active adults and retirees from across Williamson County who share a love of the outdoors and the beautiful trails that the region has to offer. The all-volunteer club organizes guided group hikes three to four times per week on trails throughout Williamson County and the surrounding Hill Country, ranging from easy, flat walks suitable for beginners to moderate hikes with gentle elevation changes for more experienced hikers. Regular hiking locations include the San Gabriel River Trail in Georgetown, Lake Georgetown trails, Brushy Creek Trail in Round Rock and Cedar Park, Berry Springs Park, and periodic excursions to Balcones Canyonlands, Inks Lake, and Pedernales Falls state parks. Each hike is led by experienced volunteer trail leaders who set a comfortable pace, provide information about the local flora, fauna, and geology, and ensure that all participants have an enjoyable, safe experience. The club emphasizes camaraderie and social connection alongside physical activity, with many hikes followed by a group breakfast or coffee stop at a nearby restaurant. Membership is open to adults of all ages, though the majority of members are retirees and semi-retired adults who appreciate the club's relaxed pace and welcoming atmosphere. Annual dues are minimal and cover insurance, trail permits, and coordination costs. New members are always welcome, and no prior hiking experience is required. The club maintains an active email list and social media presence where hike schedules, trail conditions, and photos are regularly shared.
shortDescription: Volunteer-run hiking club for active adults with guided hikes across WilCo trails.

event.title: Spring Wildflower Hike
event.detail: Guided wildflower hike at Lake Georgetown. All levels welcome. Bring water and sunscreen.

name: Brushy Creek Trail Walking Group
address: Brushy Creek Lake Park, 3300 Brushy Creek Rd, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: The Brushy Creek Trail Walking Group is an informal community of walkers who gather five mornings a week at Brushy Creek Lake Park to walk the scenic paved trails that wind along Brushy Creek through Round Rock and Cedar Park. The group is primarily made up of retirees and active adults who enjoy the combination of outdoor exercise, natural beauty, and friendly conversation that makes morning walks such a pleasant way to start the day. The Brushy Creek Trail system spans over six miles of paved, accessible pathways through parks, neighborhoods, and natural areas, providing a variety of routes that keep daily walks interesting. Group members typically walk at a moderate pace for 30 to 60 minutes, with some choosing shorter routes and others completing the full trail. The trail is flat and well-maintained, making it accessible for walkers of varying fitness levels, including those using walking aids. Morning walks often conclude with coffee or breakfast at nearby cafes, extending the social aspect of the group. There are no formal membership requirements, dues, or sign-ups. Simply show up at the Brushy Creek Lake Park parking area any weekday or Saturday morning and join the group. Regular walkers include residents of nearby neighborhoods in Round Rock and Cedar Park, as well as participants who drive from Leander, Pflugerville, and Georgetown because they enjoy the trail and the people. The walking group is a wonderful example of how Williamson County's excellent trail infrastructure supports active, connected lifestyles for adults of all ages.
shortDescription: Free morning walking group on the scenic Brushy Creek Trail in Round Rock and Cedar Park.

name: Texas Two-Step Dance Studio
address: 800 S Austin Ave, Suite 101, Georgetown, TX 78626
description: Texas Two-Step Dance Studio in Georgetown is a lively, welcoming space where adults of all ages come to learn and enjoy social dancing. Owner and instructor Jackie Morales has been teaching dance for over 20 years and specializes in partner dances popular with the 55+ community, including Texas two-step, waltz, swing, cha-cha, and line dancing. Jackie's teaching style is patient, encouraging, and fun, making it easy for beginners to pick up the basics and for experienced dancers to refine their skills. The studio offers group classes, private lessons, and weekly social dance nights that bring together dancers from across Williamson County. Daytime classes are especially popular with retirees, with morning and early afternoon sessions dedicated to beginners, intermediate, and line dancing. The studio's Austin Avenue location near the Georgetown Square features a spacious hardwood dance floor, quality sound system, and comfortable seating for socializing between dances. Dancing provides outstanding physical and cognitive benefits for older adults, improving balance, coordination, cardiovascular fitness, and memory while providing joyful social interaction. Many members of the Sun City Texas dance clubs practice at the studio, and the Thursday evening social dances draw a lively crowd of dancers of all levels who enjoy an evening of music, movement, and friendship. Class packages and monthly memberships are available at affordable rates, and first-time visitors can attend one group class free of charge. No partner is required for group classes, as partners rotate throughout each session.
shortDescription: Welcoming social dance studio with two-step, swing, and line dancing in Georgetown.

name: Safe at Home Modifications
address: 2200 E Palm Valley Blvd, Suite 100, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Safe at Home Modifications is a Williamson County contractor specializing in home accessibility modifications that help seniors age in place safely and comfortably. Owner and Certified Aging-in-Place Specialist (CAPS) Michael Torres has completed hundreds of home modification projects throughout Round Rock, Georgetown, Cedar Park, Pflugerville, and the surrounding communities. Their services include grab bar installation, walk-in shower conversions, wheelchair ramp construction, stair lift installation, doorway widening, non-slip flooring, improved lighting, lever-handle hardware replacement, and comprehensive bathroom and kitchen accessibility renovations. Michael begins every project with a thorough home safety assessment, walking through the residence with the homeowner to identify fall hazards, accessibility barriers, and opportunities to improve safety and comfort. This assessment is offered at no charge and results in a detailed, prioritized list of recommended modifications with clear pricing. Safe at Home Modifications works with occupational therapists, physical therapists, and home health agencies who refer clients needing home modifications, and they are familiar with VA grant programs, Medicaid waiver funding, and other assistance programs that may help offset the cost of home modifications for qualifying individuals. Their team of licensed, insured craftsmen completes work with minimal disruption to the household, and every project is backed by a workmanship guarantee. For families who want their loved ones to remain safely at home, Safe at Home Modifications provides the expertise and craftsmanship to make that possible.
shortDescription: Certified aging-in-place home modifications specialist serving all of Williamson County.

deal.title: Free Home Safety Assessment
deal.detail: Includes written recommendations and estimates

name: AccessAbility Home Solutions
address: 601 E Whitestone Blvd, Suite 210, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: AccessAbility Home Solutions in Cedar Park specializes in installing stair lifts, home elevators, platform lifts, and vertical wheelchair lifts for homeowners throughout western Williamson County. Their focus on mobility equipment sets them apart from general contractors, as their team has specific expertise in the engineering, installation, and maintenance of mechanical lift systems that help individuals with mobility limitations access all levels of their home. They represent several leading stair lift and home elevator manufacturers, offering both curved and straight stair lift models, residential elevators in various sizes and configurations, and outdoor vertical platform lifts for accessing elevated entries or decks. Every installation begins with a detailed home evaluation where their technician measures the stairway or space, discusses the homeowner's needs and preferences, and recommends the most appropriate equipment. AccessAbility provides complete installation services, including any necessary structural modifications, electrical work, and finishing touches. Their maintenance program includes annual safety inspections and servicing to keep equipment operating reliably for years. The Whitestone Boulevard office features a showroom where customers can see and try different stair lift models before making a purchase decision. AccessAbility Home Solutions is licensed, bonded, and insured, and offers financing options to help make accessibility equipment affordable. They work with VA programs and some insurance plans that cover mobility equipment for qualifying individuals. Their responsive service team provides prompt support for equipment issues, with emergency service available for lift malfunctions.
shortDescription: Stair lift, home elevator, and platform lift specialists in Cedar Park.

name: WilCo Aging-in-Place Remodeling
address: 707 S Main St, Suite 300, Georgetown, TX 78626
description: WilCo Aging-in-Place Remodeling is a Georgetown-based general contractor that specializes in comprehensive home renovations designed to help seniors live comfortably and safely in their homes for years to come. Unlike general remodeling companies that occasionally take on accessibility projects, WilCo Aging-in-Place focuses exclusively on modifications for older adults, bringing deep knowledge of universal design principles, ADA guidelines, and the practical needs of people aging in their homes. Their most popular projects include full bathroom renovations with curbless showers, comfort-height toilets, and anti-scald fixtures; kitchen remodels with lowered countertops, pull-out shelving, and improved task lighting; first-floor master suite additions for homeowners who can no longer safely navigate stairs; and whole-home flooring replacements that eliminate tripping hazards. Every project is guided by a design consultant who is a Certified Aging-in-Place Specialist and who works closely with each homeowner to balance safety, aesthetics, and budget. Sun City Texas homeowners are among their most frequent clients, as many are looking to update their homes to accommodate changing mobility needs while maintaining the attractive finishes they value. WilCo Aging-in-Place Remodeling is fully licensed, insured, and registered with the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation. They provide detailed written estimates with no hidden costs and stand behind their work with a comprehensive warranty. Financing options are available for qualifying homeowners.
shortDescription: Comprehensive aging-in-place bathroom, kitchen, and home remodeling in Georgetown.

name: Grab Bar Guys of Central Texas
description: Grab Bar Guys of Central Texas is a mobile installation service that specializes in one of the most impactful and affordable home safety modifications available: professionally installed grab bars. Based in Pflugerville and serving all of Williamson County, their trained installers mount grab bars in bathrooms, showers, bathtubs, hallways, and stairways using proper techniques and structural anchoring methods that ensure each bar can support the weight and force it may need to bear. Unlike many handyman services that treat grab bar installation as a minor side job, Grab Bar Guys has made it their sole focus, building expertise in proper placement, selecting the right bar styles and finishes for each application, and understanding the specific needs of older adults and people with disabilities. They carry a wide selection of grab bar styles ranging from basic chrome safety bars to decorative designer grab bars that blend seamlessly with upscale bathroom finishes. Most installations are completed in under two hours, and their pricing includes the grab bar, all hardware, and professional installation with a satisfaction guarantee. Grab Bar Guys works frequently with occupational therapists, physical therapists, and home health agencies who recommend specific grab bar placements for their patients. They also partner with local hospitals to provide discharge planning support, installing bars before a patient returns home from surgery or a hospital stay. The company is popular among Sun City Texas homeowners who are proactively adding safety features to their homes. Free phone consultations help clients determine what they need before scheduling an installation visit.
shortDescription: Expert grab bar installation service covering all of Williamson County.

deal.title: 10% Off 3+ Grab Bars
deal.detail: Install 3 or more grab bars and save 10%

name: Smart Home Senior Solutions
address: 661 Louis Henna Blvd, Suite 210, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Smart Home Senior Solutions helps older adults in Williamson County leverage technology to live more safely and independently at home. Their team specializes in selecting, installing, and training seniors on smart home devices and systems that enhance safety, convenience, and peace of mind. Popular installations include video doorbell systems, smart locks with keypad or remote access, motion-activated lighting, smart thermostats with simplified controls, medical alert systems, automated medication reminders, voice-activated assistants configured for easy use, smart smoke and carbon monoxide detectors, and security camera systems that allow family members to check in remotely. What makes Smart Home Senior Solutions different from a typical technology retailer or installer is their focus on simplicity and training. Every installation includes patient, hands-on instruction tailored to the client's comfort level with technology. They create simple, laminated quick-reference guides for each device and offer follow-up support calls to answer questions as clients get accustomed to their new systems. Their Louis Henna Boulevard office in Round Rock serves as a consultation center where clients can see demonstrations of available technologies before deciding what to install. Home consultations are also available throughout Williamson County. The company works with adult children who live out of the area and want to help their parents stay safe at home, coordinating installations remotely and providing family members with access to monitoring features. Packages are available at various price points, and all equipment recommendations prioritize ease of use over flashy features.
shortDescription: Senior-friendly smart home technology installation and training in Round Rock.

name: Green Horizons Lawn Care
description: Green Horizons Lawn Care provides reliable, affordable lawn maintenance and landscaping services to homeowners throughout Georgetown and northern Williamson County. For many seniors and retirees, keeping up with yard work becomes increasingly difficult, and Green Horizons offers a welcome solution with weekly or bi-weekly mowing, edging, trimming, and blowing services that keep properties looking their best without the physical strain. Owner Carlos Rivera started the company over 12 years ago and has built a reputation for dependability, fair pricing, and quality work that has earned him a large base of loyal customers in Sun City Texas, Georgetown Village, Berry Creek, and the surrounding neighborhoods. Beyond basic mowing, Green Horizons offers seasonal services including spring and fall cleanups, leaf removal, mulch installation, shrub trimming, flower bed maintenance, tree trimming up to 15 feet, and holiday light installation and removal. Their crews are trained to be respectful of their clients' property and schedule, arriving at consistent times each week and completing work quietly and efficiently. For seniors who spend winters away from their Williamson County homes, Green Horizons offers a seasonal caretaker plan that keeps the property maintained and monitored while they are away. All services are priced transparently with flat monthly rates, and free estimates are provided for new clients. Green Horizons is fully insured and maintains a consistent, well-trained crew to ensure quality does not vary from visit to visit.
shortDescription: Reliable lawn maintenance with senior-friendly service throughout Georgetown.

name: WilCo Lawn Pros
description: WilCo Lawn Pros delivers comprehensive lawn care and landscaping services to homeowners across Round Rock, Pflugerville, Hutto, and central Williamson County. Their full-service approach means clients can rely on a single company for everything from weekly mowing and routine maintenance to irrigation system repair, landscape design, hardscape installation, and seasonal planting. For seniors who want to maintain beautiful outdoor spaces without the physical demands of doing it themselves, WilCo Lawn Pros serves as a trusted partner who takes care of the yard so they can simply enjoy it. Their team includes certified irrigation technicians, trained landscapers, and experienced lawn care specialists who understand the specific challenges of maintaining healthy landscapes in the Central Texas climate, including drought management, dealing with oak wilt, and choosing plants that thrive in the region's alkaline soil and hot summers. WilCo Lawn Pros offers customized maintenance plans that can be scaled to fit any budget, from basic mow-and-go service to comprehensive estate care that includes detailed bed maintenance, seasonal color changes, and proactive turf management. They are especially popular among homeowners in the Teravista, Forest Creek, and Behrens Ranch communities. All work is performed by trained, insured crews, and the company uses professional-grade equipment maintained to high standards. Customer communication is a priority, with automated service confirmations, digital invoicing, and a responsive customer service team. Free property evaluations and estimates are available for prospective clients.
shortDescription: Full-service lawn care and landscaping across Round Rock and central WilCo.

name: Mr. Fix-It Senior Handyman
description: Mr. Fix-It Senior Handyman is a Georgetown-based handyman service that caters specifically to the needs of senior homeowners throughout Williamson County. Owner Jim Cooper, a retired contractor with over 30 years of construction experience, started Mr. Fix-It to help older adults in his community with the small to medium home repairs and maintenance tasks that can become challenging with age. Jim and his small team handle a wide range of jobs including plumbing repairs, electrical fixture replacement, ceiling fan installation, door and window adjustments, weather stripping, caulking, minor drywall repairs, cabinet hardware replacement, shelf installation, picture hanging, smoke and CO detector replacement, air filter changes, and light fixture swaps. They also perform seasonal maintenance tasks like gutter cleaning, pressure washing, and preparing homes for winter or summer. What distinguishes Mr. Fix-It from typical handyman services is Jim's patience, trustworthiness, and genuine respect for his clients. He arrives on time, explains what he is going to do and why, works cleanly, and charges fair, transparent rates with no surprise fees. Many of his clients are Sun City Texas homeowners who have Jim on speed dial for anything that needs fixing around the house. He is background-checked, fully insured, and happy to provide references from other senior clients. Mr. Fix-It offers a popular maintenance plan that includes quarterly home visits to check and address small issues before they become big problems.
shortDescription: Trusted handyman specializing in home repairs for senior homeowners across WilCo.

name: Reliable Home Helpers
description: Reliable Home Helpers provides dependable handyman services to homeowners throughout Round Rock, Pflugerville, and central Williamson County, with a strong focus on serving the needs of older adults and seniors. Their team of skilled, background-checked technicians handles everything from minor repairs and maintenance tasks to small remodeling projects. Common services include faucet and toilet repairs, light fixture and ceiling fan installation, door hardware replacement, shelf and grab bar mounting, TV mounting, furniture assembly, interior and exterior painting touch-ups, deck and fence repairs, and appliance connection. Reliable Home Helpers understands that for many seniors, having a trustworthy, reliable person to call for home repairs provides significant peace of mind. Their technicians are trained to be patient, respectful, and communicative, explaining what needs to be done and providing honest assessments of whether a job requires a licensed specialist. Pricing is straightforward with hourly rates and no trip charges within their service area. They also offer a popular honey-do list service, where clients can save up a list of small tasks and have a technician address them all in a single visit, maximizing efficiency and minimizing cost. Online booking is available through their website, and same-week appointments are often available. Reliable Home Helpers is fully insured, and their customer satisfaction guarantee means they will return to make things right if any work does not meet expectations. Saturday service is available for tasks that cannot wait until the work week.
shortDescription: Background-checked handyman team serving seniors in Round Rock and Pflugerville.

name: Tidy Home Senior Cleaning
description: Tidy Home Senior Cleaning is a residential cleaning service based in Round Rock that specializes in serving senior homeowners and retirees throughout Williamson County. Owner Maria Santos started the company after years of hearing from her own parents and their friends about the difficulty of finding a cleaning service that was trustworthy, consistent, and understanding of the needs of older adults. Every Tidy Home cleaner is background-checked, bonded, insured, and trained in the specific preferences and sensitivities of senior clients. They use low-odor, hypoallergenic cleaning products, pay attention to fall hazards during cleaning, and are trained to notice and gently report potential safety concerns such as burned-out smoke detectors, tripping hazards, or signs that a client may need additional support at home. Services include standard weekly or bi-weekly cleaning, deep cleaning, move-in and move-out cleaning, and seasonal cleaning projects. Their consistent team model means the same cleaner visits each time, building trust and familiarity that many senior clients deeply appreciate. Tidy Home also offers add-on services like laundry, bed changing, light organizing, and interior window washing. Pricing is flat-rate based on home size and cleaning frequency, with no hidden surcharges. The company serves homes throughout Round Rock, Pflugerville, Hutto, Georgetown, and Cedar Park. Many referrals come from home health agencies and family members who want to ensure their loved one's home is clean, healthy, and safe. Free in-home estimates are available, and there are no long-term contracts required.
shortDescription: Trusted cleaning service specializing in senior homes across Williamson County.

deal.title: First Clean 25% Off
deal.detail: For new recurring clients, valid through March 2026

name: Sparkling Clean WilCo
description: Sparkling Clean WilCo provides professional residential cleaning services to homes throughout Cedar Park, Leander, Liberty Hill, and western Williamson County. Their experienced cleaning teams deliver thorough, detailed cleanings that go beyond surface-level tidying to include deep kitchen and bathroom sanitization, baseboard and trim dusting, floor polishing, appliance cleaning, and attention to the often-overlooked areas that accumulate dust and grime over time. For seniors and retirees, Sparkling Clean WilCo offers the peace of mind that comes with a clean, hygienic home maintained by reliable, trustworthy professionals. Their teams are fully insured and bonded, and every employee completes a thorough background check before joining the company. The company uses an eco-friendly cleaning product line that is effective yet gentle, avoiding harsh chemicals that can aggravate respiratory conditions or sensitivities common among older adults. Scheduling is flexible, with weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly service options available. Their online booking system makes it easy to schedule, reschedule, or adjust services, and automated reminders help clients keep track of upcoming appointments. Sparkling Clean WilCo is locally owned by longtime Cedar Park residents who take pride in their community and treat every client's home with the respect it deserves. Satisfaction is guaranteed on every visit, and their quality assurance process includes follow-up calls to ensure clients are happy with the service. Free estimates are provided based on home size and desired service level, with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.
shortDescription: Eco-friendly residential cleaning for seniors in Cedar Park, Leander, and Liberty Hill.

name: Georgetown Senior Activity Center
description: The Georgetown Senior Activity Center on Main Street is a vibrant community hub operated by the City of Georgetown Parks and Recreation Department, serving adults aged 55 and older with a comprehensive schedule of programs, classes, events, and services designed to promote active, healthy, connected living. The center offers daily fitness classes including yoga, tai chi, line dancing, chair exercise, and strength training. Educational programming includes computer classes, art workshops, creative writing groups, foreign language conversation circles, and lectures on topics ranging from history and science to health and financial planning. Social activities keep the calendar full with card games, board game groups, bingo, potluck lunches, holiday celebrations, birthday parties, and day trips to Austin-area attractions and cultural events. The center also hosts regular health screenings, Medicare counseling sessions, and information fairs where local service providers share resources with attendees. A congregate meal program provides nutritious, affordable lunches five days a week in a sociable dining setting, with meals provided through a partnership with the Williamson County Area Agency on Aging. The Georgetown Senior Activity Center also serves as a resource hub, with staff who can connect visitors with transportation assistance, meal delivery programs, utility assistance, tax preparation help, and other community services. Membership is free for Georgetown residents aged 55 and older, and non-residents are welcome with a nominal annual fee. The center is a cornerstone of Georgetown's commitment to supporting its growing population of active, engaged seniors.
shortDescription: City-operated senior center with fitness, meals, classes, and community resources.

name: Allen R. Baca Center
address: 301 W Bagdad Ave, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: The Allen R. Baca Center in Round Rock is a multi-generational community center with robust programming specifically designed for adults aged 50 and older. Operated by the City of Round Rock Parks and Recreation Department, the Baca Center is situated in the heart of downtown Round Rock on West Bagdad Avenue, within walking distance of restaurants, shops, and the historic downtown district. The center offers a diverse lineup of activities for seniors including fitness classes, art workshops, technology training, book clubs, cards and games groups, educational lectures, social dances, and seasonal events. Their popular Third Thursday Dance series features live music and attracts a lively crowd of dancers from across the region. The center houses a fitness room with equipment appropriate for older adults, a computer lab with free Wi-Fi and tech support, a library corner, a game room, and a multipurpose room used for classes, events, and community meetings. Daily congregate meals are available through the Meals on Wheels partnership, providing nutritious lunches in a social setting. The Baca Center also provides valuable resource and referral services, connecting seniors with information about healthcare options, transportation, food assistance, legal aid, and other support programs available in Williamson County. Staff members are knowledgeable about local resources and happy to help visitors navigate available services. Annual membership is affordable, with reduced rates for Round Rock residents, and many activities are free or low-cost. The Baca Center is a welcoming space where seniors can stay active, learn new skills, make friends, and feel connected to their community.
shortDescription: Downtown Round Rock community center with 50+ programs, meals, and social events.

name: Pflugerville Senior Center
description: The Pflugerville Senior Center on Railroad Avenue provides a welcoming gathering place for older adults in the Pflugerville community, offering a mix of fitness, social, educational, and wellness programming tailored to the interests and needs of residents aged 55 and older. The center's daily schedule includes exercise classes such as chair yoga, line dancing, strength and balance, and water aerobics at the nearby Pflugerville pool facility. Social activities range from card games and dominoes to craft workshops, quilting groups, movie showings, and potluck dinners. The center hosts regular educational presentations on health topics, financial planning, technology use, and community resources, often featuring speakers from local organizations and businesses. A highlights of the weekly calendar is the Wednesday lunch program, which brings together members for a nutritious, affordable meal in a sociable atmosphere. The center also provides practical support services including blood pressure screenings, hearing screenings, benefits counseling, and connections to Williamson County social services and aging programs. Staff members maintain a resource directory of local service providers and can help members find assistance with transportation, home repairs, healthcare, and more. The Railroad Avenue location is accessible by car and via CARTS public transit, making it reachable for seniors throughout the Pflugerville area. Membership is free, and most activities are offered at no cost or for a small materials fee. The Pflugerville Senior Center is a place where older adults can stay engaged, build friendships, and access the support they need to thrive.
shortDescription: Free senior center with fitness, social activities, and support services in Pflugerville.

name: Williamson County Area Agency on Aging
description: The Williamson County Area Agency on Aging serves as the central resource and coordination point for aging services throughout the county, and they also manage several volunteer programs that allow active retirees to give back to their community while making a meaningful difference in the lives of fellow seniors. Their volunteer programs include Meals on Wheels delivery, where volunteers deliver nutritious meals to homebound seniors across the county; the Senior Companion Program, which pairs trained volunteers with isolated seniors for regular visits and companionship; the Benefits Counseling program, where trained volunteers help Medicare beneficiaries understand and navigate their insurance options; and various event and office support roles. Volunteering through the Area Agency on Aging is a deeply rewarding experience that connects retirees with purpose, social engagement, and the knowledge that they are helping their neighbors age with dignity. The agency provides thorough training for all volunteer roles, mileage reimbursement for meal delivery volunteers, and ongoing support and recognition throughout the year. Beyond volunteer programs, the Area Agency on Aging serves as an information clearinghouse for all aging-related services in Williamson County, helping seniors and their families find home care, transportation, legal assistance, benefits, housing, and social services. Their office in the Williamson County complex on Wilco Way in Georgetown is staffed with knowledgeable case managers and social workers who can assess needs and connect individuals with appropriate resources. All services are provided free of charge.
shortDescription: Central resource for aging services and senior volunteer programs in Williamson County.

name: Habitat for Humanity - WilCo
description: Habitat for Humanity of Williamson County provides meaningful volunteer opportunities for retirees and active adults who want to use their time and skills to improve their community. Volunteers are needed for a variety of roles including construction site work on new homes and home repair projects, ReStore operations at their building materials resale store, office support, event planning, and community outreach. For retirees with construction skills or those who simply enjoy hands-on work, volunteering on Habitat build sites is an especially rewarding way to stay active, learn new skills, and contribute to affordable housing in Williamson County. No prior construction experience is required, as skilled team leaders provide instruction and supervision on-site. Volunteers can participate as often as their schedule allows, from a single day to regular weekly commitment. The ReStore on IH-35 in Round Rock accepts donations of gently used furniture, appliances, building materials, and home improvement items, and sells them to the public at reduced prices. Proceeds support Habitat's mission to build and repair homes for families in need throughout the county. Volunteering at the ReStore is a great option for those who prefer retail, organizational, or customer service work over physical construction. Habitat for Humanity of Williamson County hosts regular volunteer orientations and provides all necessary training and safety equipment. Many retirees have found that volunteering with Habitat provides a sense of purpose, camaraderie, and physical activity that enriches their retirement years while making a tangible difference in the lives of local families.
shortDescription: Build homes and volunteer at the ReStore with Habitat for Humanity in WilCo.

name: Celebration Church - Georgetown Senior Ministry
description: Celebration Church in Georgetown operates an active Senior Ministry program that provides spiritual fellowship, social connection, and practical support for adults aged 55 and older in the Georgetown community. The Senior Ministry, known as Celebration Seniors, meets regularly for Bible study groups, prayer meetings, potluck gatherings, day trips to area attractions, and service projects that allow members to give back to the community. The program is designed to foster deep friendships and spiritual growth among older adults while addressing the practical needs that sometimes accompany aging. Celebration Seniors volunteers visit homebound members, provide transportation to church services and medical appointments, deliver meals to those recovering from illness or surgery, and offer a compassionate care ministry that provides emotional and spiritual support during difficult times. The church's Rabbit Hill Road campus features accessible facilities including level parking, elevator access, hearing assistance devices in the sanctuary, and large-print materials. Sunday worship services offer a blend of contemporary and traditional elements, and multiple service times accommodate different preferences and schedules. The church also hosts community events that are open to the public, including holiday celebrations, concert series, and community service days. Celebration Church welcomes people of all backgrounds and denominations, and their Senior Ministry leadership team is passionate about creating an inclusive, warm environment where older adults feel valued, connected, and supported in their faith journey.
shortDescription: Active church senior ministry with Bible study, social events, and care programs.

name: St. William Catholic Church - Senior Fellowship
address: 620 Round Rock West Dr, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: St. William Catholic Church in Round Rock has served the Williamson County Catholic community for decades and maintains an active Senior Fellowship program that brings together parishioners aged 55 and older for faith formation, social connection, and community service. The Senior Fellowship, known as the Golden Fellowship Ministry, meets monthly for luncheons, guest speakers, and social activities, with additional gatherings for holiday celebrations, seasonal outings, and volunteer projects. The group organizes day trips to local attractions, museums, and restaurants, providing opportunities for fun and friendship beyond the church campus. Service projects include assembling care packages for homebound parishioners, participating in the St. Vincent de Paul food pantry, and visiting seniors in local assisted living facilities and nursing homes. The parish also offers a dedicated ministry to the homebound and sick, with trained Eucharistic ministers who bring communion to those who cannot attend Mass, and a prayer chain that provides spiritual support during times of illness or difficulty. St. William's campus on Round Rock West Drive features fully accessible worship spaces, ample parking, and a welcoming parish hall where fellowship events are held. The parish offers Mass times throughout the week, confession schedules, and sacramental preparation for all ages. Whether you are a lifelong Catholic or exploring the faith for the first time, St. William's Senior Fellowship provides a supportive community where older adults can deepen their spiritual life, forge meaningful friendships, and serve others in the spirit of Christian love.
shortDescription: Catholic parish with active senior fellowship, outreach ministry, and community service.

name: CARTS - Capital Area Rural Transportation System
description: CARTS, the Capital Area Rural Transportation System, provides essential public transportation services throughout Williamson County, connecting seniors and individuals with disabilities to medical appointments, shopping, social services, and community activities. Their fleet of accessible vehicles includes fixed-route buses and demand-response curb-to-curb service that can be scheduled in advance. For seniors who no longer drive or prefer not to drive, CARTS provides a lifeline to independence and community participation. Fixed routes operate throughout Georgetown and connect to other Williamson County communities, while their demand-response service covers a broader area and can pick up riders at their homes for pre-scheduled trips. Fares are very affordable, with reduced rates for seniors aged 60 and older, Medicare recipients, and individuals with disabilities. CARTS also operates the Georgetown Transit service, which provides local circulator routes within the Georgetown city limits, connecting residential areas to key destinations like the Georgetown Square, medical offices, the senior center, and shopping centers. Their vehicles are wheelchair-accessible and equipped with lifts and securement systems for mobility devices. Riders can call the scheduling office to arrange trips, with 24-hour advance notice recommended for demand-response service. CARTS also provides medical transportation for Medicaid recipients and operates interurban routes connecting Georgetown to Austin and other regional destinations. For seniors in rural parts of Williamson County, including Jarrell, Florence, and Taylor, CARTS may be one of the only transportation options available, making their service invaluable for maintaining access to healthcare and essential services.
shortDescription: Public transit system serving seniors across Williamson County with accessible vehicles.

name: WilCo Senior Rides
description: WilCo Senior Rides is a nonprofit transportation service dedicated to helping seniors aged 60 and older in Williamson County get where they need to go safely, affordably, and with dignity. Founded by a group of community volunteers who recognized that transportation is one of the biggest challenges faced by older adults who have stopped driving, WilCo Senior Rides provides door-to-door rides for medical appointments, grocery shopping, pharmacy visits, banking, senior center activities, and social engagements. Volunteer drivers use their personal vehicles to provide rides, and the organization covers insurance and fuel costs. Riders are asked to schedule trips at least 48 hours in advance, and a suggested donation of $3 to $5 per one-way trip helps sustain the program, though no one is turned away for inability to pay. The volunteer driver model means riders get more than just a ride. They get a friendly, patient companion who will wait during appointments, help carry groceries, and provide the kind of personal attention that commercial ride services cannot match. WilCo Senior Rides currently serves the Round Rock, Georgetown, Cedar Park, and Pflugerville areas, with expansion plans underway for eastern Williamson County. The organization is always looking for volunteer drivers who can donate a few hours each week or month to help their neighbors maintain independence. Volunteer drivers undergo background checks and driving record reviews, and receive orientation training before they begin driving. For seniors who need transportation assistance, WilCo Senior Rides provides a compassionate, community-driven solution.
shortDescription: Nonprofit volunteer-driver ride service for seniors 60+ across Williamson County.

name: Go Go Grandparent - WilCo Area
description: Go Go Grandparent is a nationwide rideshare concierge service that makes ride-hailing technology accessible to seniors who may not use smartphones or ride-hailing apps. The service works by allowing riders to request Lyft and Uber rides simply by calling a toll-free phone number, without needing a smartphone, app, or credit card on file with the ride-hailing platform. An automated phone system guides callers through the process of requesting a ride from their home to a specified destination, and the service dispatches the nearest available rideshare driver. Family members can set up and monitor the account, receive ride notifications, and track their loved one's trips through a family dashboard. This combination of ride-hailing convenience with phone-based accessibility makes Go Go Grandparent an excellent option for Williamson County seniors who need on-demand transportation but are not comfortable with smartphone technology. The service operates 24/7, providing rides to medical appointments, shopping, social events, and anywhere else a standard rideshare can go. Pricing includes the standard rideshare fare plus a small service fee for the concierge layer. Go Go Grandparent can arrange rides throughout Williamson County, from urban areas like Round Rock and Cedar Park to more rural communities where traditional public transit options may be limited. The service also offers meal delivery and grocery delivery concierge options, extending the same phone-based simplicity to food and shopping needs.
shortDescription: Phone-based rideshare service making Lyft and Uber accessible without a smartphone.

name: Monument Cafe
